arabic_text: ذٰ لِكَ الۡڪِتٰبُ لَا رَيۡبَ ۛۚ ۖ فِيۡهِ ۛۚ هُدًى لِّلۡمُتَّقِيۡنَۙ‏
translation: _Ye Allah ki kitaab, isme koi shaq nahi, hidayat hai un logo'n k liye jo parhezgaar hain.  (Allah k gazab se darte hain)_
tafseer:
-
▪️ ** 

Iska ek seedha-saadhaa matlab to ye hai ki bila shuba ye Allah ki kitaab hai magar ek maanaa ye bhi hai ki yeh aisee kitaab hai jisme  koi shak o shubaa nahi hai kyunki isko naazil karne wala wo hai jo tamaam sachchaaiyo'n ka ilm rakhtaa hai aur is kitaab me sachchaai bayaan hui hai.
     Isliye sach to ye hai ki isme shaq ki koi gunjaaish hi nahi hai. 

Aur ye kitaab logo'n k liye hai to saraasar hidaayat aur rahanumaai, par issey faaydaa uṭhaane ke liye zaruri hai ki aadmee me kuch khoobiya ho'n. Inme se pehli khoobi ye hai ki aadmee parhezgaar ho, yaani 👉🏻quraan hidaayat hai un logo ke liye jo ḍarr jaayein aur jo na ḍarein, unke liye Qur'an me koi hidaayat naheen.

Muttaqi apne Rab se darne wala wo shaqsh he jo na  sirf Haram cheez ko chod de balki un cheezo ko bhi chod de jinka haram hona yaqeeni nahi  balki mashquq (doubtful)ho
 Aur 
Jo burai se bachnaa chaahtaa ho aur bhalaai ki talab rakhtaa ho, wahi shakhs qur'an majeed se hidayat hasil kar sakta hai.

arabic_text: الَّذِيۡنَ يُؤۡمِنُوۡنَ بِالۡغَيۡبِ وَ يُقِيۡمُوۡنَ الصَّلٰوةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنٰهُمۡ يُنۡفِقُوۡنَۙ‏
translation: _(Qura'n hidayat hai un logo'n k liye) Jo gaib par imaan laate hain aur namaaz qaayam karte hain aur jo rizq hamne unko diya hai, usme se kharch karte hain._
tafseer:
-
▪️ ** 

🔅Qur'an se faiz paane ke liye dusri shart hai *gaib par imaan hona*. Gaib ka maannaa wo haqeeqat hai jise insaan k havaas-e-khamsaa (sense of perception) nahi pakad paate aur na kabhi aam insaan iskaa tajurbaa kar pata hai aur na usko dekh sakta hai. Jaise Allah ki zaat, uske sifaat (attributes), farishte,  vahyi(revelation), jannat, dozakh wagairah. 

In haqeeqaton ko binaa dekhe maannaa aur is bharose par maannaa ki nabi (a.s.) inki jo khabar de rahe hain wo sachchi hai, usey gaib (unseen) par imaan laanaa kehte hain ! 

“Woh joo ita'at (obey) karege uss Rasool ummi k  Gaib ki Khabre dene wale ki Jisse likha huwa paayege apne paas Tawraat aur Injeel main”.

[● Surah A’araaf,

arabic_text: وَ الَّذِیۡنَ یُؤۡمِنُوۡنَ بِمَاۤ  اُنۡزِلَ اِلَیۡکَ وَ مَاۤ اُنۡزِلَ مِنۡ قَبۡلِکَ ۚ وَ بِالۡاٰخِرَۃِ ہُمۡ یُوۡقِنُوۡنَ ؕ﴿۴﴾
tafseer:
*
▪️
" _Aur jo imaan late hain tum par utaaree gayi kitab par (yani Qur'an) aur jo kitaabein tumse pahale utaari gayi, un sab par aur aakhirat par yaqeen rakhte hain._*
  [ *pehli 5 ayaat k andar Allah Ta'ala ne* *insaaniyat ke pehle giroh ka zikr kiya hai jo imaan tak pahunchega*]
🔅Ye paanchvi shart hai ki banda un tamaam kitaabon ko sach maane jo wahyi ke zariye se Allah ne muhammad ﷺ aur unse pehle ke nabiyon par alag alag waqt aur jagah par utaree.
       Is shart ki buniyad par Qur'an ki hidaayat ka darwaza un sab logo'n par band hai jo sire se iski zaroorat hi nahi samajhte ki insaan ko Allah ki taraf se hidaayat milni chahiye ya iski zaroorat to samajhte hain magar iske liye wahyi aur risaalat ki taraf palaṭnaa zaruri nahi samajhte. 
       Aur khud kuchh tasawwur gaḍhkar unheen ko khuda ka hukm samajh baiṭh'te hain yaa aasmaanee kitaabon ko bhi maante hain magar sirf us kitaab yaa un kitaabon par iimaan laayein jinhen unke baap-daadaa maante chale aaye hain. Rahee usi hawale se nikalee hui dusari hidaayatein to wo unko maanne se inkaar kar dete hain. 

*Giab par imaan lanaa, Namaz qayam karna, zakaat dena us waqt tak sahih nhi jab tak ki Rasoolallah aur saabiqa (pichle) Amibya par jo kitaabe utri hai un par imaan na ho aur saath hi akherat par yaqeen e kaamil na ho. Isliye imaan walo ko hukum e Ilahi he 👉🏻 Ae* *imaan walo ! Allah par aur uske Rasool par aur jo kitab un par utri hai us par aur jo kitab unse pehle utri hai un par imaan lao*

*An Nisa 4 : #136*

🔅Chhaṭhee aur aakhree shart ye hai ki banda akhirat par yaqeen rakhta ho. 

       Aakhirat ek jama lafz hai jo bahut se aqeedo ko milakar bola jaata hai. Isme ye-ye baatein shamil hain 👇🏼
 
🔹️(1) Insaan is duniyaa me gair-zimmedaar nahi hai balki apne tamaam aamaalo ke liye Allah ke saamane jawab'deh hai. 

🔹️(2) Duniya ka haalia nizaam hamesha rehne wala nahi hai balki ek muqarrar waqt aane par jisse sirf Allah hi jaantaa hai, iska khatma ho jaayega.

🔹️(3) ibtada se lekar qayaamat tak zameen par jitni cheeze  paida hui thi aur hogi  ek hi saath dobara paida karega aur sabko jama karke unke amaal  ka hisaab lega aur har ek ko uske kiye ka poora-poora badlaa degaa. 

🔹️(4) Allah ke is faisale ke mutabik jo log nek qaraar paaye jayenge, wo jannat me jaayenge aur jo log bure ṭhehraaye jayenge wo dozakh me ḍaal diye jaayenge. 

🔹️(5) Kamyabi aur naqami ka asal myaar humari aaj ki dunyavi zindagi ki khushahaali aur bad'haalee nahi hai. Balki asal me kamyab insaan wo hai jo Allah ke aakhri faisale me kamyab  ṭhehre aur na- qaam  wo hai jo wahan (akhirat me) qamyab nahi ho paya. jin logon ko yaqeen na ho wo Qur'an se koi faaydaa hasil nahi kar sakte.

arabic_text: یُخٰدِعُوۡنَ اللّٰہَ وَ الَّذِیۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡا ۚ وَ مَا یَخۡدَعُوۡنَ  اِلَّاۤ  اَنۡفُسَہُمۡ وَ مَا یَشۡعُرُوۡنَ ؕ﴿۹﴾

arabic_text: وَ  اِذَا قِیۡلَ لَہُمۡ اٰمِنُوۡا کَمَاۤ اٰمَنَ النَّاسُ قَالُوۡۤا اَنُؤۡمِنُ کَمَاۤ اٰمَنَ السُّفَہَآءُ ؕ اَلَاۤ اِنَّہُمۡ ہُمُ  السُّفَہَآءُ  وَ لٰکِنۡ لَّا  یَعۡلَمُوۡنَ ﴿۱۳﴾

_Khabardaar! Sach to ye hai ki yehi log bey waqoof hain, lekin woh yeh baat nahi jantay._" 

🔅Yaani jis tarah tumhari qaum ke dusre log sach aur ikhlas (sincerity)ke sath musalman huye hain, usi tarah tum bhi agar Islam qubool karte ho to imaandari ke sath sachche dil se qubool karo.

     Unki soch ke mutabik aqalmandi ye thi ki aadmi sach aur jhoot ki behes me naa pade balki har mamle me sirf apna matlab aur apna fayda dekhe.

arabic_text: اَوۡ کَصَیِّبٍ مِّنَ السَّمَآءِ فِیۡہِ ظُلُمٰتٌ وَّ رَعۡدٌ وَّ بَرۡقٌ ۚ یَجۡعَلُوۡنَ اَصَابِعَہُمۡ فِیۡۤ  اٰذَانِہِمۡ مِّنَ الصَّوَاعِقِ حَذَرَ الۡمَوۡتِ ؕ وَ اللّٰہُ مُحِیۡطٌۢ بِالۡکٰفِرِیۡنَ ﴿۱۹﴾

arabic_text: وَ اِنۡ کُنۡتُمۡ فِیۡ رَیۡبٍ مِّمَّا نَزَّلۡنَا عَلٰی عَبۡدِنَا فَاۡتُوۡا بِسُوۡرَۃٍ مِّنۡ مِّثۡلِہٖ ۪ وَ ادۡعُوۡا شُہَدَآءَکُمۡ مِّنۡ دُوۡنِ اللّٰہِ  اِنۡ کُنۡتُمۡ صٰدِقِیۡنَ ﴿۲۳﴾

Allah kay siwa apney tamam madad gaaron ko bulalo, agar tum sachay ho (to aisa kar k dikhao)._

arabic_text: اِنَّ اللّٰہَ لَا یَسۡتَحۡیٖۤ اَنۡ یَّضۡرِبَ مَثَلًا مَّا بَعُوۡضَۃً فَمَا فَوۡقَہَا ؕ فَاَمَّا الَّذِیۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡا فَیَعۡلَمُوۡنَ اَنَّہُ الۡحَقُّ مِنۡ رَّبِّہِمۡ ۚ وَ اَمَّا الَّذِیۡنَ کَفَرُوۡا فَیَقُوۡلُوۡنَ مَا ذَاۤ  اَرَادَ  اللّٰہُ بِہٰذَا مَثَلًا ۘ یُضِلُّ بِہٖ کَثِیۡرًا ۙ وَّ یَہۡدِیۡ بِہٖ کَثِیۡرًا ؕ وَ مَا یُضِلُّ بِہٖۤ  اِلَّا الۡفٰسِقِیۡنَ ﴿ۙ۲۶﴾

arabic_text: وَ عَلَّمَ اٰدَمَ الۡاَسۡمَآءَ کُلَّہَا ثُمَّ عَرَضَہُمۡ عَلَی الۡمَلٰٓئِکَۃِ ۙ فَقَالَ اَنۡۢبِئُوۡنِیۡ بِاَسۡمَآءِ ہٰۤؤُلَآءِ اِنۡ کُنۡتُمۡ صٰدِقِیۡنَ ﴿۳۱﴾

Yaha'n hum ye zaroor jaan lein k
    📖 Quran e hakeem 2 ✌🏼 tarha k ilm ko mustanad (authentic / bharose wala) maanta hai-

       Jiske zariye physical phenomena of Nature se related jo bhi baatein hain (yani humari zahiri duniya se judi baatein), unke baare me hume pata chalta hai.

arabic_text: فَاَزَلَّہُمَا الشَّیۡطٰنُ عَنۡہَا فَاَخۡرَجَہُمَا مِمَّا کَانَا فِیۡہِ ۪ وَ قُلۡنَا اہۡبِطُوۡا بَعۡضُکُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوٌّ    ۚ وَ لَکُمۡ فِی الۡاَرۡضِ مُسۡتَقَرٌّ  وَّ مَتَاعٌ اِلٰی  حِیۡنٍ ﴿۳۶﴾

arabic_text: فَتَلَقّٰۤی اٰدَمُ مِنۡ رَّبِّہٖ کَلِمٰتٍ فَتَابَ عَلَیۡہِ ؕ اِنَّہٗ ہُوَ  التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِیۡمُ ﴿۳۷﴾
tafseer:
* 

*▪️* 
" _Phir hazrat Aadam ne apne Rab se kuch kalemaat seekh liye jiske sabab (jis reason se) unhone Allah se tawba ki to Allah ne unki tawba qubul kar li. Beshaq wo tawba qurul krne wala hai aur Raham krne wala hai._*

      🔅 Allah tawba karne walo'n ki tawba qubul farmata he hai aur bahut rahmo karam wala hai. 

       🔹Allah Ta'ala ne jab makhlooq ko paida kiya to apne paas arsh par 'Loh-e-Mahfuz (kitab) me likh diya 👇🏼 
     *_Meri Rahmat mere gazab par bhari rahegi_* 
*[Sahi muslim:book 4, 416]* 

       Hazrat Aadam a.s. Allah ki na'farmani par behad naadim (sharminda) hue, Allah ne unhe maafi kaise maangi jaati hai, wo kalemaat bhi sikha diye. 

    ◼️ Apni galtiyo par sharminda hona ye aadmiyat hai (insan hone ki nishani) aur uspe ade rehna ye shaitanat hai. 

     ☝🏼 Asal tawba gunaho'n par nadamat ka paida hona hai. 
   
 ◼️ Aadam a.s ki jagah jannat me hai wo dobara waha'n jayenge lekin shart Allah ki  farmabardari (obedience) rahegi.

      Zameen aarzi (for short term) thikana hoga lekin zameen me qadam qadam par aazmaaishein (tests) hongi. Inn haalat me Tawqa (righteous,God consciousness) ekhteyaar (adopt) krna hoga.

      Jo shaitan k raaste par chala, usne apne aap par bada zulm kiya. Wo dunya me bhi ruswa hoga aur akhirat me jahannam ka azaab payega. 

➖➿➖➿➖➿➖➿➖

arabic_text: قُلۡنَا اہۡبِطُوۡا مِنۡہَا جَمِیۡعًا  ۚ فَاِمَّا یَاۡتِیَنَّکُمۡ مِّنِّیۡ ہُدًی فَمَنۡ تَبِعَ ہُدَایَ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَیۡہِمۡ  وَ لَا ہُمۡ یَحۡزَنُوۡنَ ﴿۳۸﴾
translation: _Humne kaha: tum sab yaha'n se utar jao, phir agar tumhare paas meri taraf se koi hidayat aaye to jisne pmeri hidayat ki pairwi (obey) ki to un par koi khauf nahi hoga aur na wo ghamgheen (sad) honge._
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
 

      🔅 Jannat se nikaale jaane k baad  hidayat hazrat Aadam A.s ko di jaa rahi hai k Ambiya, Rasool aur  kitaaben bheji jayengi. To jo apne zamaane ki kitaabein aur Nabi s.a w. ki taabedaari (obey) karega usey akhirat ke maidan me koi dar nahi hoga.  

   *🔸 _Meri hidayat ki pairwi krne wale na gumrah honge aur naa badbakht aur badnaseeb_* 
[ *Suratul Taha: 123*] 
   
 ◾Is ruku me 2 ulum (knowledge) ka zikr kiya gaya hai. Shuru me *"Acquired knowledge"* ka aur at the end of the ruku *"Revealed knowledge"* ka. 

〰️➿〰️➿〰️➿〰️➿〰️ 

*

arabic_text: وَ الَّذِیۡنَ  کَفَرُوۡا وَ کَذَّبُوۡا بِاٰیٰتِنَاۤ اُولٰٓئِکَ اَصۡحٰبُ النَّارِ ۚ ہُمۡ فِیۡہَا خٰلِدُوۡنَ ﴿۳۹﴾
translation: _Aur jin logo ne kufr kiya aur hamari aayato ko jhutlaya, wahi dozakh wale hain aur usme rahenge hamesha._
tafseer:
*

*▪️*            
 

    🔅 Ajal (shuru se) se abad tak (end) k insaano k liye Allah ki taraf se yeh farmaan hai k uss raaste ki pairwi kare jo uske Rab ne uske liye choose kiya hai.  
    
  Aur jahannamiyo ki nishani kya hai? 👉🏻 Wo dur bhagte hain hidayat k raaste se,  kitaab se, paigamber se. 

       *🔸️Aur meri yaad se muh modne wale ki dunya me tangi ki zindagi hogi  aur akhirat me hum usey andha karke uthaenge.* 
[ *Suratul Taha: 124*]

arabic_text: یٰبَنِیۡۤ  اِسۡرَآءِیۡلَ اذۡکُرُوۡا نِعۡمَتِیَ الَّتِیۡۤ اَنۡعَمۡتُ عَلَیۡکُمۡ وَ اَوۡفُوۡا بِعَہۡدِیۡۤ اُوۡفِ بِعَہۡدِکُمۡ  ۚ وَ اِیَّایَ فَارۡہَبُوۡنِ ﴿۴۰﴾
translation: _Ae bani Israel! Yaad karo meri wo neamtein (favours)  jinhe maine tum par inaam kiya aur tum mere ehad (wada) ko pura karo, (so) me tumhare ehad ko pura karunga aur tum (kisi aur se nahi) sirf mujhse daro_
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*

       🔅Allah apni neamato ka zikr kr raha hai jo usne bani Israel par ki. Allah kehta hai- 👉🏻 "maine tumhe apni kitab di, shariyat tumhe aata farmai, nabuwat tumhari qaum ko di (hazrat yaqub a.s. hazrat ibrahim a.s. k pote aur hazrat is'haaq a.s. ke bete the. Aur sab ambiya inhi ki nasal me se aaye hain siwaye Mohammad s.a.w ke, jo ki hazrat Ibrahim a.s. k pehle bete, hazrat Ismaeel a.s. ki aulad me the).
      Lihaaza mere waade ko pura karo.'' 

     *♦️Ek Bada ehad (waada) to sabne kiya hai jo Ehad e Alast hai. Allah ne ye ehad sab se liya hai- 👉🏻 ' _kya main tumhara Rab nhi hun_'* 

     🔹️ Ek waada old testament ki book of deuteronomy (torat ki naqal ka ek  hissa) k 18 chapter ki ayat 18-19 me aaya he :
     🔸️Hazrat Moosa ko khitab (address) kar k Allah ne ye alfaaz farmaye hain k *'main inke bhaiyo me se tere maanind (like you) ek nabi bhejunga aur uske muh me apna kalam daalunga aur wo wahi kuch batayega jo main ussey kahunga'*. 

     🔅Ye hazrat Moosa ki ummat ko bataya jaa raha hai k Nabi e aakhiruz zamaan aayenge aur tumhe unhe qubul karna hoga. (details will come in surah Al Aaraaf in shaa Allah) 
    

    🔸️ To farmaya jaa raha hai- 👉🏼 *"tum mere ehad ko pura karo, mere is Nabi a.s. ko tasleem (accept) karo, imaan laao,,, to tum par mere in'aam aur badhte chale jayenge. Aur sirf mujh hi se daro"*  

      🔺️ Allah ne har paigamber se ye ehad liya hai k wo aanewale paigamber ka naam aur nishaniya ummat ko bata kar jaye aur ye cheez pakki kar k jaye k jab wo paigamber aayein to unke upar imaan lana hoga. 

〰️➿〰️➿〰️➿〰️➿〰️

arabic_text: وَ اٰمِنُوۡا بِمَاۤ اَنۡزَلۡتُ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا مَعَکُمۡ وَ لَا تَکُوۡنُوۡۤا اَوَّلَ کَافِرٍ   ۢ بِہٖ ۪ وَ لَا تَشۡتَرُوۡا بِاٰیٰتِیۡ ثَمَنًا قَلِیۡلًا ۫ وَّ اِیَّایَ فَاتَّقُوۡنِ ﴿۴۱﴾

*▪️*

translation: tum bhi agle logon k pichhe chal padoge qadam ba qadam, baalisht bhar baalisht, hatta k unme se koi goh (iguana, large lizard) k suraakh me daakhil hua to tum bhi uske piche chale jaoge
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
    _"Kya tum logo'n ko to neki ka hukum dete ho aur apne Aap ko bhul jaate ho..?_
_Halanki tum kitaab padhte ho, phir kya tum aqal nahi'n rakhte?"_
 
     🔅Ye yahudi k priests (paadri)  Jerusalem me baith kar logo'n ko Tawheed (belief in one God) ki dawat diya karte the. Par soodi (usury, interest) karobaar bhi wo sath me kar rahe hote the. 
Haalat ye the k logo'n ko kehte the nek bano aur khud saari buraiya'n karte the. 

       ♦️Qaumo ki tabaahi (destruction) ki ek bahut badi wajah yeh hai k ulema (Religious scholars) munafiq (hypocrite), laparwah, duniyaparast (materialistic) aishparast (ऐय्याश) ho jaate hain.  👉🏻 Aisi soorat me qaumein tabaah aur barbad ho jaati hain. 

       ⭕ [Baar baar bani Israel ki qaum ki kharabiyo ka zikar kar k hume bhi warn kiya jaa raha hai k in sab cheezo'n se humein alert (hoshiyar) rehna hai. Warna hum me bhi kharabiya'n  aur barbaadiya'n aaengi. Lihaaza in waqiyaat se humein sabaq lene hain. ] 

       *🔹 Rasoolallah sallallahu alaihi wa sallam ne farmaya: * 
(Agle logon se murad hai 👉🏻 Jews n Christians) 

*[Sunan ibne Majjah 3994- sahih]*

arabic_text: وَ اتَّقُوۡا یَوۡمًا لَّا تَجۡزِیۡ نَفۡسٌ عَنۡ نَّفۡسٍ شَیۡئًا وَّ لَا یُقۡبَلُ مِنۡہَا شَفَاعَۃٌ وَّ لَا یُؤۡخَذُ مِنۡہَا عَدۡلٌ وَّ لَا ہُمۡ یُنۡصَرُوۡنَ ﴿۴۸﴾
translation: Aur uss din se daro jb koi Jaan kisi dusri Jaan ko kuch faida nahi degi aur na ussey koi sifarish (intercession) qubul ki jayegi  aur na ussey koi badla liya jayega aur na uski madad ki jayegi
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
__ 

     🔅Asal cheez Akherat hai 👈🏼 Ye zehan me rahega to insaan sidha-sahi rahega. Is ayat me Akherat k aitbaar se 4 points highlight kiye gaye hain - 

1️⃣ Koi Jaan pehchan kaam nahi ayega.  

2️⃣ Na kisi ki sifarish qubul ki jayegi.

       ♦️Allah ne hukum diya k gaaye qurban kar do. Wo chahte to koi si bhi gaaye lete aur qurban kar dete, iske baad koi masla nahi rehta.

      Lekin 👉🏻 ye ab baal ki khaal utaarne lage aur apne liye phir mushkil khadi kar li.

       Wo kat hujjati isliye kar rahe the k unke dil me bachhde ki mohabbat khuba (pila) di gayi thi. Unke sub-conscious mind me wo sochte the k iss hujjat baazi se gaaye zibah karne ka hukum tal jayega. 

〰️▪️〰️▪️〰️▪️〰️

arabic_text: قَالُوا ادۡعُ لَنَا رَبَّکَ یُبَیِّنۡ لَّنَا مَا لَوۡنُہَا  ؕ قَالَ  اِنَّہٗ یَقُوۡلُ  اِنَّہَا بَقَرَۃٌ صَفۡرَآءُ  ۙ فَاقِعٌ لَّوۡنُہَا تَسُرُّ النّٰظِرِیۡنَ ﴿۶۹﴾
tafseer:
* 

*▪️* 
_"Bani Israel kehney lagay : 'aap humari khatir apney rab say darkhuwast kijiye kay humein saaf saaf bataye kay uss ka rang kaisa ho-?'_ 
_Hazrat Moosa ne kaha : 'Allah ne wahi k zariye mujhe bataya hai kay woh aise tez shokh zard (golden) rang ki gaye ho jo dekhney walon ka dil khush karde."_ 

       ♦️ Wahi cheez jo Bani Israel k dimag me thi k hume nahi karna zibah.

         Allah ne wahi karne ka hukum diya kyunki unhone gold jewellery se bachhda banaya hua tha to hukum hua k ab golden colour ki gaaye hi zibah karo. 

➖〰️➿〰️➿➖

arabic_text: قَالُوا ادۡعُ لَنَا رَبَّکَ یُبَیِّنۡ لَّنَا مَا ہِیَ ۙ اِنَّ الۡبَقَرَ تَشٰبَہَ عَلَیۡنَا ؕ وَ  اِنَّاۤ اِنۡ شَآءَ  اللّٰہُ  لَمُہۡتَدُوۡنَ ﴿۷۰﴾
translation: Bani Israel ne (phir) kaha k apne Rab se ye bhi puchh kar batao k wo kis kism ki gaye ho (yani khol kar bataye). Beshaq hum pr to mushtabe ho gayi hai ye baat (ambiguous) k kaun si gaaye ho; aur beshaq Allah ne chaha to hum zarur aisi gaaye talaash kar lenge.
tafseer:
* 

*▪️* 
__ 

       ☝🏼 Allah ka hukum bila chu chara maan lena, ye insaan ka farz hai. Isliye k Allah k har hukum me koi na koi wisdom hoti hai, zaruri nhi hai k wo insaan ki aqal me aa jaaye. 
Bandagi yahi hai k uske har hukum k saamne *sar Tasleem e kham* kar diya jaye (sar ko jhuka diya jaye). 

     ♦️ Gaaye zibah karne me zyada sawalo ki wajah se Bani Israel ko gaaye chose karna mushqil ho gaya. 

   ☝🏼Yaha par Bani Israel se ek aqalmandi ye ho gayi k unhone in shaa Allah (Allah ne chaha to) bol diya. Agar in shaa Allah na bola hota to unpar Allah ka azaab aana hi tha. 

〰️▪️〰️▪️〰️▪️〰️

arabic_text: قَالَ اِنَّہٗ یَقُوۡلُ  اِنَّہَا بَقَرَۃٌ لَّا ذَلُوۡلٌ تُثِیۡرُ الۡاَرۡضَ وَ لَا تَسۡقِی الۡحَرۡثَ ۚ مُسَلَّمَۃٌ لَّا شِیَۃَ فِیۡہَا ؕ قَالُوا الۡئٰنَ جِئۡتَ بِالۡحَقِّ ؕ فَذَبَحُوۡہَا وَ مَا کَادُوۡا یَفۡعَلُوۡنَ ﴿۷۱﴾

*

_"Hazrt Moosa ne kaha: Allah Ta'ala farmata hai k wo gaaye aisi honi chahiye k jisko zameen me hal chalaane k liye jota na gaya ho (badi laadli kism ki gaaye 👉🏻kabhi usse kaam na liya gaya ho) aur na kheti me paani dene k liye istemaal hui ho aur be-aib,  be-daag ho.        🔺️ ☝🏼Bani Israel ne har koshish ki thi iss hukum se bhaagne ki.

arabic_text: وَ اِذۡ قَتَلۡتُمۡ نَفۡسًا فَادّٰرَءۡتُمۡ فِیۡہَا  ؕ وَ اللّٰہُ مُخۡرِجٌ مَّا کُنۡتُمۡ تَکۡتُمُوۡنَ ﴿ۚ۷۲﴾

arabic_text: فَقُلۡنَا اضۡرِبُوۡہُ بِبَعۡضِہَا  ؕ  کَذٰلِکَ یُحۡیِ اللّٰہُ  الۡمَوۡتٰی  ۙ وَ یُرِیۡکُمۡ اٰیٰتِہٖ لَعَلَّکُمۡ تَعۡقِلُوۡنَ ﴿۷۳﴾
tafseer:
* 

*▪️* 
_"Hamne phir wahi ki Moosa a.s ko k wo jo gaaye qurban ki hai uske gosht ka koi tukda se murde ko chhuye (touch kare)_
_Issi tarha Allah murdo ko bhi zinda kar lega aur wo tumhe apne qudrat ki nishaniyan (mojizaat) dikhata hai taaki tum samajh jao."_

    🔹️  ☝🏼Is waqiye se Allah ki qudrat ki ye nishani bhi zaahir hoti hai k murdo ko zinda karna uske liye asaan hai. Marne k baad Allah dobara zinda karega. 

     🔸️☝🏼Ambiya kiraam ki maujoodgi me iss tarah k jo mojizaat zaahir hote hain. Inka maqsad ye hota hai k unke sathiyon me akhri darje me hujjat tamaam ho jaye (argument complete ho jaye).

Kyunki unhone hi paigamber k jaane k baad uss dawat ko aage lekar chalna hota hai.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ قَسَتۡ قُلُوۡبُکُمۡ مِّنۡۢ بَعۡدِ ذٰلِکَ فَہِیَ کَالۡحِجَارَۃِ اَوۡ اَشَدُّ قَسۡوَۃً  ؕ وَ  اِنَّ مِنَ الۡحِجَارَۃِ لَمَا یَتَفَجَّرُ  مِنۡہُ الۡاَنۡہٰرُ  ؕ وَ اِنَّ مِنۡہَا لَمَا یَشَّقَّقُ فَیَخۡرُجُ مِنۡہُ الۡمَآءُ  ؕ وَ اِنَّ مِنۡہَا لَمَا یَہۡبِطُ مِنۡ خَشۡیَۃِ اللّٰہِ   ؕوَ مَا اللّٰہُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُوۡنَ ﴿۷۴﴾
translation: Phir iske baad tumhare dil (waaps) sakht ho gaye goya (jaise) k koi paththar... ya sakhti me kuch usse bhi zyada... aur beshaq paththaron me bhi aise hai jinme se nehre beh nikalti hain.. aur umne kuch aise bhi hain jo khud phat padte hain aur Allah k Khauf ki wajah se unme se paani nikalna shuru ho jaata hai aur kai aise hain jo Allah k  khauf se gir padte hain, aur Allah Ta'ala gaafil nahi hai usse jo tum kar rahe ho.
tafseer:
* 

*▪️* 
__

arabic_text: اَفَتَطۡمَعُوۡنَ اَنۡ یُّؤۡمِنُوۡا لَکُمۡ وَ قَدۡ کَانَ فَرِیۡقٌ مِّنۡہُمۡ یَسۡمَعُوۡنَ کَلٰمَ اللّٰہِ ثُمَّ یُحَرِّفُوۡنَہٗ مِنۡۢ بَعۡدِ مَا عَقَلُوۡہُ وَ ہُمۡ یَعۡلَمُوۡنَ ﴿۷۵﴾

_"Aur jab unke pas Allah ki taraf se wo kitaab (QUR'AN) aa gayi jo uss (kitaab) ki tasdeeq karti hai (gawahi deti hai) jo unn k pas hai (torat) aur_
_Issey pehle in yahudiyon ki haalat ye thi k ye kaafiron par Allah se fatah maanga karte the, pas jab wo (haq) aa gaya jisey inhone pehchaan bhi liya to inhone inkaar kar diya._
_Pas laanat ho Allah ki aise kaafiron k upar jinhone Haq baat qubul karne se inkar kar diya."_ 

       ⚠️ History batati hai k ye wo nahanjaar qaum hai jisne yahudi paigamber Hazrat Isaa a.s. ka inkaar kar diya to humare is Rasool, jo Banu Ismaeel me se the, 👉🏻 inko kaise maante ? 

     ☝🏼 Ye kitab confirm kar rahi hai k Toraat, Injeel (Bible) bhi Allah ki kitab hain aur Quran iss baat ki bhi gawahi de raha hai jo unki kitaabon me likha hai k paigamber aakhiruz Zama (last prophet Mohammed s.a.w) ayenge. 

      Qur'an ne unn kitaabon ko (Toraat aur injeel) sachcha sabit kar diya. Quran ne aa kar in kitaabon ki izzat me izafa kar diya.

 
    🔅☝🏼Madina me 3 yahudi kabile abaad the aur ye bahut hi buzdil the aur Os aur khajraj k kabile bhi abaad the. 

      Qur'an naazil hone se pehle yahudi iss kitaab aur iss paigamber k itne shedaai (chahnewale) the k jab kaafiron se inn yahudiyon ki jung hoti aur ye haar jate (shikasht khate the) to iss kitaab aur iss paigamber k zariye se Allah ki taraf dua maanga karte the: 👉🏻

 'Ya Allah! uss paigamber ko jaldi bhej, unke saath mil kar hum puri dunya me tera naam roshan karenge.' 

      Zaahir hai unki kitaabon me likha tha Nabi alaihis Salam k baare me. 

      Lekin jab wo aaye to inhone inkaar kr diya.

Iss duaran Os aur khajraj k kabile jab makka jaate hajj k liye to nabi alaihis Salam k baare me sunte, jinke baare me inhone yahudiyon se suna tha.
 
     Yahudi to Nabi par imaan na laye lekin os aur khajraj k log imaan le aaye.. jo baad me  *'ansaar'*  kehlaye. 

➿🔹️➿🔹️➿🔹️➿

arabic_text: بِئۡسَمَا اشۡتَرَوۡا بِہٖۤ اَنۡفُسَہُمۡ  اَنۡ یَّکۡفُرُوۡا بِمَاۤ  اَنۡزَلَ اللّٰہُ  بَغۡیًا اَنۡ یُّنَزِّلَ اللّٰہُ مِنۡ فَضۡلِہٖ عَلٰی مَنۡ یَّشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِہٖ  ۚ فَبَآءُوۡ بِغَضَبٍ عَلٰی غَضَبٍ ؕ وَ  لِلۡکٰفِرِیۡنَ عَذَابٌ مُّہِیۡنٌ ﴿۹۰﴾
translation: Bahut hi buri cheez hai jiske badle unhone sauda kar liya apni jaano ka- yeh k wo uss cheez ka inkaar karte the jo Allah ne naazil ki, sirf hasad ki wajah se  (jealously) k Allah apne bando me se jiss par chahta hai apna Fazal (favours) naazil kar deta hai.  Iski wajah se Allah k gazab par gazab (double gussa) k haqdaar wo ho gaye. Aur kaafiron k liye zaleel (be-izzat) aur ruswa (badnaam) kar dene wala azaab hai.
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
__ 

*▪️وَ اِذَا قِیۡلَ لَہُمۡ  اٰمِنُوۡا بِمَاۤ اَنۡزَلَ اللّٰہُ قَالُوۡا نُؤۡمِنُ بِمَاۤ  اُنۡزِلَ عَلَیۡنَا وَ یَکۡفُرُوۡنَ بِمَا وَرَآءَہٗ  ٭ وَ ہُوَ الۡحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا مَعَہُمۡ   ؕ قُلۡ فَلِمَ تَقۡتُلُوۡنَ اَنۡۢبِیَآءَ اللّٰہِ مِنۡ قَبۡلُ اِنۡ کُنۡتُمۡ مُّؤۡمِنِیۡنَ ﴿۹۱﴾*
_"Aur jab inhe kaha jaata hai k imaan le kar aao us par jo Allah ne naazil kiya hai (iss paigamber k upar) to kehte hain: 'hum usi par imaan laate hain jo hum par naazil hua hai aur jo uske alawa hai uska hum inkaar karte hain' , halanki Quran haq hai, uss kitaab ki tasdeeq karta hai (gawahi deta hai k wo kitaabe sacchchi hai) jo unke pas hain_
_Ae Nabi ! Aap keh dijiye, phir Issey pehle tum Allah k nabiyo ko kyun qatal karte rahe, agar tum momin ho?"_

     🔅 In Dono ayaato ka khusala kuch iss tarha hai- 👇🏻👇🏻 

➡️ Ab tak jo bhi paigamber aaaye wo  ibrahim alaihis Salam ki nasal me se the. 

➡️ ibrahim alaihis Salam k 2 bete the- 
1️⃣ Ismail a.s  
2️⃣ Is'haq a.s 

Bani Israel is'haq a.s k bete Yaqoob a.s ki aulaad me se the. 
Hazrat Moosa, Hazart dawood, Hazrat Suleman  (aur bhi bahut saare) aur last me Hazrat Isa alaihimas salam ye sab Israeli paigamber the. 

    ☝🏼 jab Mohammad sallallahu alaihi wa sallam Hijrat karke madina tashreef laye uss waqt madina me 3 yahudi kabile abaad the aur baaqi dusre kabile the jin me se prominent kabile Oss aur khajraj naam k the. 

      Jihaalat (days of ignorance) k dino jb yahudi aur madina k dusre  kabilo ki  jange hoti thi to yahudi buzdil hone ki wajah se maar khaate the. 

➡️ tab yahudi aalim kehte the k abhi tum maar lo humko ... lekin jab humare aakhri pegamber ayenge kitab le kar, to hum unn k saath mil kar tumhe maarenge. 

Aur wo Allah se duae bhi karte the 👉🏻 'yaa Allah 🤲🏼 jaldi jaldi uss paigamber ko bhej, k hum unke saath mil kar qitaal karein (jihad) aur Allah k Deen ka bol bala karein. 

   🔸️☝🏼 lekin jab Nabi alaihis Salam ne madina aa kar yahudiyon ko imaan laane ki dawat di iss khayal se k ye kitaabon ko jaante the, Paigambero se waqif the, unki aulaad me se the.. to ye yahudi zarur imaan le aayenge ..  
     To tawakko k ulat yahudiyon ne hasad (jealousy) ki wajah se Aap alaihis Salam ka inkaar kar diya. 

     Aur oss aur khajraj k kabile jo jaahil anpadh the kitaabon se, paigambero se na-waaqif the magar yahudi aalimo se Mohammad s.a.w k baare me sirf sun rakha tha 👉🏻 ye Aap alaihis Salam par imaan le aaye aur yahi log phir Ansaar bhi kehlaye. 

     💢 Bani Israel ki badmaashiyo ki wajah se paigambero ko bheje jana ka silsila Bani Israel se shift kr k Bani Ismaeel me muntaqil (shift) kar diya tha Allah ne (as a punishment).

       Yahudi kehne lage k paigamber agar Bani Israel me se hote to hum zaroor imaan laate.  

➡️ inhone Nabi alaihis Salam kainkaar kar k apni kitaabo ka bhi inkaar kiya, unn kitaabon me Nabi alaihis Salam ki prophesies (bhavishyawaniya) maujood thi. 

➡️  yahudi kehte the hum sirf Israeli paigambero ko hi maanenge 👉🏻 jaisa k inka daawa tha. 

    ♦️  Lekin inhone yahudi paigambero ka bhi sirf inkaar hi nahi kiya balki unko qatal bhi kiya, jinme 👉🏻
Hazrat Zakariya a.s 
Hazrat Yahya a.s 
Aur bhi dusre paigambero shumar hain aur
Hazrat Isa alaihis Salam k qatal ki bhi saazish ki to Allah ne unhe zinda aasmaano me utha liya.

arabic_text: وَ لَقَدۡ جَآءَکُمۡ مُّوۡسٰی بِالۡبَیِّنٰتِ ثُمَّ اتَّخَذۡتُمُ الۡعِجۡلَ مِنۡۢ بَعۡدِہٖ وَ اَنۡتُمۡ ظٰلِمُوۡنَ ﴿۹۲﴾
translation: Aur beshaq Moosa a.s. tumhare pas khuli nishaniyan le kar aaye, phir uske baad tumne bachhde ko poojna shuru kar diya aur tum ho hi zaalim.
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
__

       💎 Moosa alaihis salam 2 bade mojizaat le kar aaye the- 

1️⃣Asaa (laathi) jo Allah k hukum se saanp ban jaati thi. 

2️⃣ Apne girebaan se haath nikaalte the to unki hatheli Suraj ki tarha roshan ho jaati thi. 

     ♦️ Iske alawa bhi 7 mojizaat aur hain jinki detail surah Al Araaf me aayegi. 
Moosa alaihis salam itni khuli nishaniyan le kar aaye lekin phir bhi Bani Israel ki haalat ye thi k chand (some) dino k liye jab Hazrat Moosa koh e Toor par gaye the to yahudiyon ne bachhde ko ma'bood bana liya tha. 

     Waqt ka paigamber dunya me maujood hai, abhi faut nahi huye hain. Aap imagine kariye 70,000 uske sahaba (saathi) Murtad (islam ko chhod kar dusre mazhab me chale jana) ho gaye. Unhone bachhde ko ilaah (mabud) k taur par maan liya tha. 
Wo khud hi zaalim the.
 
➖🔹️➖🔹️➖🔹️➖ 

*

arabic_text: وَ اِذۡ اَخَذۡنَا مِیۡثَاقَکُمۡ وَ رَفَعۡنَا فَوۡقَکُمُ الطُّوۡرَ ؕ خُذُوۡا مَاۤ اٰتَیۡنٰکُمۡ بِقُوَّۃٍ وَّ اسۡمَعُوۡا ؕ قَالُوۡا سَمِعۡنَا وَ عَصَیۡنَا ٭ وَ اُشۡرِبُوۡا فِیۡ قُلُوۡبِہِمُ الۡعِجۡلَ بِکُفۡرِہِمۡ ؕ قُلۡ بِئۡسَمَا یَاۡمُرُکُمۡ بِہٖۤ  اِیۡمَانُکُمۡ   اِنۡ  کُنۡتُمۡ مُّؤۡمِنِیۡنَ ﴿۹۳﴾
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
_"Aur yaad karo jab humne tumse ye Ehad liya tha (mtlb tumhare forefathers se) Aur tum par Toor pahad ko buland kiya aur kaha k humne tumhe jo diya hai usey mazbooti se pakdo aur gaur se suno_

_"Unhone kaha: 'humne suna aur  nafarmani ki'... Aur bachhde ki mohabbat unko pila di gayi unke kufar ki wajah se._
_Kya hi buri cheez ka hukum deta hai tumhara imaan_
(K bachhde ko khuda bana lo) 

    ⭕ Pehle jo waqiyaat aaye the wo dobara se repeat ho rahe hain. 

    ☝🏼6 lac saathi the Moosa alaihs salam k jo 12 kabilon me divided the. 

    Itna bada Toor pahad Allah ne badal ki tarah suspend (uthaya) kar diya tha unke upar aur kaha k is kitab (Toraat) ki  taalimaat par amal karo aur iske upar chalo, ispar imaan lao, jaisa k imaan lane ka haq hai. 

Uss waqt to unhone maan liya kitabullah ko lekin baad me uska paas na rakh sake. 

    🔺️ Ye bade jugatbaaz (lafzo ko hair -fer karne me maahir) the. Jaan bujh kar Ambiya ki taalimaat ko badal dete the. 

Yaha'n par kaha gaya *'suno aur farmabardari karo'* 

Inhone kaha 👉🏼 *'humne suna aur nafarmani ki'* 

     ☝🏼Unke andar khannaas (evil spirit) bhara hua tha butt (idol) parasti ka. Uski wajah se Allah ne inke dilo 🫀 par aisi mohar lagai k bachhde ki mohabbat aur zyada inke dilo me bhar di. 

   ☝🏼Aur hum padh bhi chuke hain k ye mohabbat nikaalne k liye Allah ne inse golden colour ki gaaye ko zibah karwaya tha kyunki unke andar ka khannaas mar nahi raha tha.

arabic_text: قُلۡ  اِنۡ کَانَتۡ لَکُمُ الدَّارُ الۡاٰخِرَۃُ عِنۡدَ اللّٰہِ خَالِصَۃً مِّنۡ دُوۡنِ النَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُا الۡمَوۡتَ اِنۡ کُنۡتُمۡ صٰدِقِیۡنَ ﴿۹۴﴾
translation: Ae Nabi ! Inse farmao k tum samjhte ho akherat me jo Jannat hai uske haqdaar sirf tum hi ho.  to phir maut ki tamanna karo agar tum sachche ho.
tafseer:
* 

*▪️* 
__

⚠️ Ek aur Universal Truth ♾️ 
Yahudi nasli ghamand me mubtala the. Wo samjhte the-
👇🏻👇🏻 

▫️☝🏼Ham Allah k chahite hain, Allah k bade laadle hai balki paigambero ki family se hain. 
Humari nasal ibrahimi hai aur hum chosen people of the Lord hain (chune huye log). 

▫️☝🏼 Bani Israel me 1400 saal tak musalsal (continuously) paigamber aaye. 

▫️➡️ Unki qaum par 3 kitaabein naazil hui. 

     🔅☝🏼Ye sab qualities hone k bawjood wo amal se khaali the. Ghamand ne unki mat (aqal) maar di thi. 

🔴 ye dhyan rahe✋🏼 ALLAH KI KISI SE RISHTEDARI NAHI HAI. 👇🏻👇🏻👇🏻 

*🔹Beshaq Allah tumhari surato aur maalo ko nahi dekhta balki wo tumhare amaal (nek kaamo) aur dilo ko dekhta hai*
*📚Ibne Majjah: 4143* 

Allah unse farma raha hai k 'agar waqai jannat tumhari hai to tum apne liye maut kyun nahi mangte.. maut ki tamanna aur dua kyun nahi karte. Iss uncomfortable duniya me kyu aaram se jee rahe ho, agar jannat tumhari hai  to maango maut aur phir jannat me raho❗

🚫 Halanki, Allah ne kisi bhi musalman ko maut ki dua karne ki ijazat nahi di hai. 
Agar maut ki tamanna zaruri bhi ho jāye toh yeh kahein ke -
🤲🏼🤲🏼
*"Aye Allah! Jab tak mere liye zindagi behtar hai mujhe zinda rakh aur jab mere liye maut behtar ho toh mujhe uthā lijiye."* 
[ *📚Sahih Bukhari, Book 80, Hadith 48*]

arabic_text: وَ لَنۡ یَّتَمَنَّوۡہُ اَبَدًۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ اَیۡدِیۡہِمۡ  ؕ وَ اللّٰہُ عَلِیۡمٌۢ بِالظّٰلِمِیۡنَ ﴿۹۵﴾
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*

_"Aur ye kabhi bhi maut ki tamanna nahi karenge un amaal ki wajah se jo inhone aage bheje huye hain. (jo kartut inhone kiye hain)_
_Aur Allah zaalimo ko khub jaanta hai."_

arabic_text: وَ اِذۡ یَرۡفَعُ  اِبۡرٰہٖمُ  الۡقَوَاعِدَ مِنَ الۡبَیۡتِ وَ اِسۡمٰعِیۡلُ ؕ رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلۡ مِنَّا ؕ اِنَّکَ اَنۡتَ السَّمِیۡعُ الۡعَلِیۡمُ ﴿۱۲۷﴾
translation: Aur wo waqt yaad karo jab ibrahim alaihis Salam ne buland ki baitullah ki deeware aur unke bete(Ismaeel) bhi unke saath the wo saath ye dua bhi kar rahe the ~  'Ae humare Rab ! Humari taraf se (iss khidmat ko) ko qubul kar k hum Tera Ghar taameer kar rahe hain (bana rahe hain), beshaq tu sunne wala aur Ilm wala hai' .
tafseer:
*
 
*▪️*
__ 

     🔅☝🏼
Jab se pehla insaan dunya me maujood hai, Allah Ta'ala ne *Baitullah* ko apni ibadat k liye ghar muqarrar kiya hua hai.

*🔷 Sabse pehla ghar jo Allah ne ibadat k liye muqarrar kiya, wo hai jo Bakka (makka) shehar me hai*
[ *📘Surah Ale imran:*]

   🔸️Waqt guzarne k saath saath Baitullah k asaar mit gaye the, phir Allah ne wahi k zariye hazrat ibrahim alaihis salam ko bataya k yaha kaba tha, to waha (imarat ki) buniyadein uthai gayi. 
Yaha'n par usi ka zikr hai. 

     ✋🏼 Ye Ambiya alaihimus salam ka tariqa hai k jab bhi Aap a.s. ne koi bhi kaam kiya hai, to apne Rab se dua maangi hai k ~
    'Ae Allah !🤲🏼 humari iss kawish (mehnat) ko apni bargah me qubul farma.'

Jab tak insan Allah k liye sincere nahi hoga, uski mehnat qubul nahi ho sakegi. 

〰️🔹️〰️🔸️〰️🔹️〰️

*

arabic_text: رَبَّنَا وَ اجۡعَلۡنَا مُسۡلِمَیۡنِ لَکَ وَ مِنۡ ذُرِّیَّتِنَاۤ اُمَّۃً مُّسۡلِمَۃً  لَّکَ ۪ وَ اَرِنَا مَنَاسِکَنَا وَ تُبۡ عَلَیۡنَا ۚ اِنَّکَ اَنۡتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِیۡمُ ﴿۱۲۸﴾
translation: Ae hamare Rab ! aur hum dono ko apna farmabardar bana le aur humari aulaad me se bhi aisi jamaat paida kar de jo teri taabe farmaan ho (hukum ki farmabardar ho, muslim ho), aur hume ibadat k tariqe bhi sikha de aur humari tauba qubul farma. Beshaq tu bahut tauba qubul karne wala, bada Raham karne wala hai.
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
__ 

   ♦️ *Muslim* ibrahim alaihis Salam ki khoobi hai, jo quran me jagah jagah aayi hai. 

      *Ibrahim na to yahudi the na nasrani (Christian) the, balki wo sabse tut kar ek Allah k ho gaye the aur Allah k taabe farmaan the (muslim the) aur wo mushrik nahi the.*
*[📘 Aal e imran : 67]* 

▪️Meaning of muslim - to submit your will to the will of Allah. 

    Apni marzi ko Allah k suprud kar dena,  Sar e tasleem kham (total submission) karne wala, apni khwahish k aage Allah k hukm ko bajaa laane (pura karne) wala. 

    Banda jab gunah karke Allah ki taraf palat'ta hai to Allah bhi bande ki Taraf ruju farmata hai. 

   ☝🏼 *'Ar Rahman'* Allah ki sift (attribute) hai, jo samundar ki tarah josh maarti hai. 

➿🔹️➿🔹️➿🔹️

arabic_text: رَبَّنَا وَ ابۡعَثۡ فِیۡہِمۡ رَسُوۡلًا مِّنۡہُمۡ یَتۡلُوۡا عَلَیۡہِمۡ اٰیٰتِکَ وَ یُعَلِّمُہُمُ الۡکِتٰبَ وَ الۡحِکۡمَۃَ وَ یُزَکِّیۡہِمۡ ؕ اِنَّکَ اَنۡتَ الۡعَزِیۡزُ الۡحَکِیۡمُ ﴿۱۲۹﴾
translation: Ae Rab! hamara ek Rasool inke andar (in logo'n me) bhej, inhi me se, jo in par teri aayat Tilawat kare aur unhe kitab aur Hikmat (wisdom) ki taaleem de aur inhe paak bhi kar, Beshaq Ae Allah ! tu bahut zarbardast hai aur hikmat wala hai.
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
__ 

   *🔷 Main apne baap Ibrahim ki dua hu'n, aur Isaa ibn e mariyam ki bashaarat (khushkhabri) hu'n aur meri maa ne ye khwab dekha k unke wujood se roshni nikli, jissey shaam k mahlaat (palaces) roshan ho gaye.* 
*📘Musnad Ahmad : 5/262, 22324* 

    🔅Nabi alaihis Salam k paidaish ki dua ibrahim alaihis Salam ne ki thi. 

   ⚠️☝🏼Ye ibrahim  alaihis Salam ki dua hai.  Allah ne iss tartib (order) ko change kiya hai ~
1.Kitab padh kar sunate hain
2. Paak karte hain
Aur 
3. Wisdom sikhate hain 

       Yahi dua surah jumah aur surah Ale imran me bhi hai. 

*🔷Wo hi hain jisne anpadho me unhi me se (Mohammad sallallahu alaihi wa sallam) ko Rasool bana kar bheja jo unke saamne uski Aayat padhte hain aur unko paak karte hain aur unko kitab aur danai (wisdom) sikhate hain aur ussey pehle to ye log khuli gumrahi me pade the*
*[Surah Jummah: 2]* 

   Paak wo hoga jis par kitab ki tilawat ki jaye aur jab tak wo paak nahi hota, usey hikmat samjh nahi aa sakti. 

〰️🔹️〰️🔸️〰️🔹️〰️

*

arabic_text: وَ مَنۡ یَّرۡغَبُ عَنۡ مِّلَّۃِ  اِبۡرٰہٖمَ  اِلَّا مَنۡ سَفِہَ نَفۡسَہٗ ؕ وَ لَقَدِ اصۡطَفَیۡنٰہُ فِی الدُّنۡیَا ۚ وَ اِنَّہٗ فِی الۡاٰخِرَۃِ  لَمِنَ الصّٰلِحِیۡنَ ﴿۱۳۰﴾
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
_"Aur kaun ruh gardaani kar sakta hai ibrahim alaihis Salam ki millat se siwae uske_
_Jisey uske nafs ne ahmak bana diya ho (ahmak means ~ bey-aqal / mental ya pagal jaisa) aur beshaq ibrahim to wo tha jisey humne chun liya tha dunya me. Aur beshaq ibrahim Akherat me zarur bil zarur humare nekokaar bando me shaamil hoga."_ 

☝🏼 yaha Ibrahim alaihis Salam ki sift (qualities) bayan karte hue Allah farmata hai k ibrahim intehaai nek achche aur mukammal insan the aur jis Deen (haq) ki dawat unhone di ussey sirf bewaqoof ya pagal ho accept nhi karega 

➿🔹️➿🔹️➿🔹️

arabic_text: اِذۡ قَالَ لَہٗ رَبُّہٗۤ  اَسۡلِمۡ ۙ قَالَ اَسۡلَمۡتُ لِرَبِّ الۡعٰلَمِیۡنَ ﴿۱۳۱﴾
translation: Aur yaad karo jab bhi uske Rab ne usse kaha k ~  'Ae Ibrahim ! sar e tasleem kham kar do' 👉🏻 to usne fauran kaha k ~ 'main saare jahan k Rab k huzur apna sar e tasleem kham karta hun.'
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
__ 

     🔅Issey zyada kisi ki tarif ho sakti hai jiske liye khud Allah keh raha hai k ~ 'koi pagal hi hoga jo Ibrahim se ru-gardaani kare.' 

      Wo to aise the jisey uske Rab ne chun liya tha. 

       Dunya me bhi aur Akherat me wo humare mukarrabeen (close) bando me se hoga. 

    ☝🏼 Allah uss pegamber, jiske imaan ka level kya tha, qualities bata raha hai k wo kaise the. Usne kis level k commitment k saath life guzari hai.

⏺️ Allah ne khawab dikhaya Ibrahim alaihis ko k bete ko zibah kar rahe hain aur beta bhi aisa farmabardar k sar jhuka Diya. 
*📘Surah saaffaat : 100-103* 

Ye sabse badi Aazmaaish thi. 

〰️♦️〰️♦️〰️♦️〰️ 

*

arabic_text: وَ وَصّٰی بِہَاۤ اِبۡرٰہٖمُ  بَنِیۡہِ وَ یَعۡقُوۡبُ ؕ یٰبَنِیَّ  اِنَّ اللّٰہَ اصۡطَفٰی لَکُمُ الدِّیۡنَ فَلَا تَمُوۡتُنَّ  اِلَّا وَ اَنۡتُمۡ  مُّسۡلِمُوۡنَ ﴿۱۳۲﴾ؕ
translation: Aur nasihat ki ibrahim ne aur yaqub ne bhi apne beto'n ki 👉🏻 Ae mere bachcho ! beshaq, Allah Ta'ala ne chun liya hai tumhe deen k liye, dekhna tumhe maut na aaye magar iss haal me k tum muslim marna.
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
__

⏺️ Jab maut ka waqt qareeb aaya to apne beto'n ko sachche musalman banne ki nasihat ki. 

    ⚠️ ☝🏼 Muslim naam Allah ko bada pasand hai. 

*هُوَ سَمّٰٮكُمُ الۡمُسۡلِمِيۡنَ ۙ مِنۡ قَبۡلُ وَفِىۡ هٰذَا*
*Usne tumhara naam muslim rakha tha aur iss kitab me bhi* 
*Surah Hajj :78* 

➿🔹️➿🔹️➿🔹️

arabic_text: اَمۡ کُنۡتُمۡ  شُہَدَآءَ  اِذۡ حَضَرَ یَعۡقُوۡبَ الۡمَوۡتُ ۙ اِذۡ  قَالَ لِبَنِیۡہِ مَا تَعۡبُدُوۡنَ مِنۡۢ بَعۡدِیۡ ؕ قَالُوۡا نَعۡبُدُ اِلٰہَکَ وَ اِلٰـہَ اٰبَآئِکَ اِبۡرٰہٖمَ  وَ  اِسۡمٰعِیۡلَ وَ  اِسۡحٰقَ  اِلٰـہًا وَّاحِدًا   ۚ ۖ وَّ نَحۡنُ لَہٗ مُسۡلِمُوۡنَ ﴿۱۳۳﴾
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
_"Kya tum uss waqt maujood the jab yaqub alaihis Salam par maut aa pahunchi jab unhone apne beton se pucha batao mere marne k baad tum kis ki ibadat Karoge,_
_To unhone kaha k ham aapke  mabud aur aapke  baap Ibrahim, Ismaeel aur ishaaq k Rab ki ibadat karenge jo k akela mabud hai.aur ham usi k taab e Farman (obedient) hain."_ 

     🔅Ye yahudiyon ko taunt kiya jaa raha hai k tum jo man'ghadat baatein bana kar islam se phir rahe ho aur galat baatein apne buzurgo k baare me kehte ho to kya uss waqt tum maujood the jab yaqub alaihis Salam ne maut k waqt sawal kiya tha k mere baad kiski ibadat Karoge -? 

☝🏼 Aaj kal humari fikr apni aulad k baare me sirf itni hoti hai k usey dunyawi zindagi me har kism ki sahulatein (facilities)  mayassar ho jayein aur Akherat se mutalliq humari tawajjo kam hi hoti hai.

 
〰️🔸️〰️🔹️〰️🔸️〰️

arabic_text: تِلۡکَ اُمَّۃٌ قَدۡ خَلَتۡ ۚ لَہَا مَا کَسَبَتۡ وَ لَکُمۡ مَّا کَسَبۡتُمۡ ۚ وَ لَا تُسۡئَلُوۡنَ عَمَّا  کَانُوۡا یَعۡمَلُوۡنَ ﴿۱۳۴﴾
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*
_"Ye ek ummat thi jo guzar chuki. Jo kuch unhone kamaya, wo unka hai (nek amal), aur jo kuch tumne kamaya, wo tumhara hai._
_Aur tum se ye nahi puchha jayega wo kya amal karte the._
( ☝🏼Lekin Tumse ye puchha jayega k tumne kaunse nek amaal kiye) 

🔹️ (Ye ayat phir repeat hogi surah Baqarah: 141) 

      ♦️Yahudi kehte the k hume ibrahimi nisbat kaam aayegi. Allah farma raha hai k wo to badi pakiza ummat thi, jo guzar gayi aur apne amaal apne saath le gayi. 

     ☝🏼 Kisi k nek amaal kisi dusre ko koi faida nahi pahuncha sakte. 

*🔷 Qayamat wale din jiske amal ne ussey pichhe kar diya, uska nasab usey aage nahi kar sakta* 
*📘 Sahi Muslim: 2699* 

*🔷Nabi alaihis Salam ne farmaya*
'Ae meri beti Fatema! mere maal se jo lena ho le lo, Allah k huzur me tumhare kuch kaam nahi aunga'
*(📘Sahi Bukhari, Sahi Muslim)* 

〰️♦️〰️♦️〰️♦️〰️

arabic_text: وَ قَالُوۡا کُوۡنُوۡا ہُوۡدًا اَوۡ نَصٰرٰی تَہۡتَدُوۡا ؕ قُلۡ بَلۡ مِلَّۃَ  اِبۡرٰہٖمَ  حَنِیۡفًا ؕ وَ مَا کَانَ مِنَ الۡمُشۡرِکِیۡنَ ﴿۱۳۵﴾
tafseer:
*
 
*▪️*
_"Aur ye kehte hain k  ban jao yahudi ya nasrani to kamyab ho jaoge,  Ae Nabi tum farmao 👉🏻nhi  ham to millat pe hai ibrahim k aur wo mushrikeen me se nhi tha._

     ⚠️☝🏼 Hum bhi to yahi kehte hain, falan firke me ho to hidayat par ho..

Allah farma raha hai k purane bhi to yahi kehte the..
*Bimari wahi hai*

arabic_text: قُوۡلُوۡۤا اٰمَنَّا بِاللّٰہِ وَ مَاۤ اُنۡزِلَ اِلَیۡنَا وَ مَاۤ اُنۡزِلَ  اِلٰۤی  اِبۡرٰہٖمَ  وَ  اِسۡمٰعِیۡلَ وَ  اِسۡحٰقَ وَ یَعۡقُوۡبَ وَ الۡاَسۡبَاطِ وَ مَاۤ اُوۡتِیَ مُوۡسٰی وَ عِیۡسٰی وَ مَاۤ اُوۡتِیَ النَّبِیُّوۡنَ مِنۡ  رَّبِّہِمۡ ۚ  لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَیۡنَ اَحَدٍ مِّنۡہُمۡ   ۫ ۖ وَ نَحۡنُ لَہٗ مُسۡلِمُوۡنَ ﴿۱۳۶﴾
tafseer:
* 

*▪️*  
_Ae musalmanon ! (danke ki chot pe) kaho k ~ 👉🏻 hum imaan laate hain-_ 
1️⃣ _Allah par_ 
2️⃣ _aur us (kalaam) par jo hum par utara gaya,_
_aur uss per bhi jo Ibrahim, Ismail, Is'haq, Yaqoob aur unn ki aulad par utaara gaya,_
_aur uss par bhi jo Musa aur Isa ko diya gaya_ 
_aur uss per bhi jo doosray pegambaron ko unn kay parwardigar ki taraf say ataa hua_ 
 _aur hum imaan laane me kisi pegamber me koi farak nahi karte. Aur ham ussi (ek khuda) k taab e Farman hain.."_

     🔅✋🏼Yaha 2 aqido ko samjh lena zaruri hai-
1️⃣ Tafzeel bainal Rusul👉🏻
Yani Ambiya me fazeelat dena ek pegamber ko dusre pegamber par 
2️⃣ Tafreek bainal Rusul👉🏻 Rasoolo me farak karna 

   ☝🏼 Islam kehta hai k Rasoolo'n  par imaan laane me aapne farak nahi karna hai - agar farak karoge to wo pakka kaafir hai. 

Albatta Tafzeel bainal Rusul 👉🏻 ek Nabi ko dusre Nabi par fazilat dena ba-shart hai. Ek dusre ki tanqees (apmaan krna) na karna quran ki doctrine se sahi hai, 👇🏻👇🏻 

*تِلۡکَ الرُّسُلُ  فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَہُمۡ عَلٰی بَعۡضٍ ۘ مِنۡہُمۡ*
*Ye Rasool hain, baaz ko hamne baaz pr fazilat di hai*
*📘Surah Baqarah:253* 
{Surah Baqarah ki 253 ayat par tafseel(detail me) se baat hogi } 

☝🏼 Yaha'n par moti baat ye hai k imaan laane me hum farak nahi kar sakte, fazilat me farak hai aur uss fazilat ko bayan karna jayaz hai ba-shart ye k tanqees  na ho. 

〰️♦️〰️♦️〰️♦️〰️

arabic_text: فَاِنۡ اٰمَنُوۡا بِمِثۡلِ مَاۤ  اٰمَنۡتُمۡ  بِہٖ فَقَدِ اہۡتَدَوۡا  ۚ وَ اِنۡ تَوَلَّوۡا فَاِنَّمَا ہُمۡ فِیۡ شِقَاقٍ  ۚ فَسَیَکۡفِیۡکَہُمُ اللّٰہُ  ۚ وَ ہُوَ السَّمِیۡعُ  الۡعَلِیۡمُ ﴿۱۳۷﴾ؕ
translation: Pas Agar (Yahud aur nasara) bhi imaan le aaye uss tariqe par jis tariqe par tum imaan laaye ho to wo phir hidayat paa jaenge, aur agar ye muh pher le to ye khoob jaan lo k wo mukhalifat par tule huye hai, to phir aiso k muqable par Allah tumhare liye kaafi hai aur wo sunne wala hai, jaanne wala hai.
tafseer:
*

*▪️*
 __

     🔅 Ye log imaan kaha se laenge. Christians Hazrat Isaa alaihis Salam ko maante the, Nabi alaihis Salam ka inkaar karte the. 
Jews Hazrat Moosa alaihis salam ko maante the aur humare pegamber s.a w. ka inkar karte the. 

☝🏼 Jo dheet log hain, unko unke haal par chhod dena hai, unka mamla Allah ta'ala khud handle karega.

arabic_text: صِبۡغَۃَ اللّٰہِ ۚ وَ مَنۡ اَحۡسَنُ مِنَ اللّٰہِ صِبۡغَۃً  ۫ وَّ نَحۡنُ لَہٗ عٰبِدُوۡنَ ﴿۱۳۸﴾
translation: ( aey musalmano ! keh do kay : )  hum per to Allah ka rang charh gaya hai. Aur Allah se behtar kiska rang ho sakta hai aur hum ussi ki ibadat karte hain.

arabic_text: قُلۡ اَتُحَآجُّوۡنَنَا فِی اللّٰہِ وَ ہُوَ رَبُّنَا وَ رَبُّکُمۡ ۚ وَ لَنَاۤ اَعۡمَالُنَا وَ لَکُمۡ اَعۡمَالُکُمۡ ۚ وَ نَحۡنُ لَہٗ  مُخۡلِصُوۡنَ ﴿۱۳۹﴾ۙ
tafseer:
*

*▪️*
_"Ae Nabi ! inse farmao k  (Ae yahud o nasara) 'tum Allah k baare me humse jhagda karte ho -?_
_Jab k wo humara bhi rab hai aur tumhara bhi Rab hai_
 _Aur humare liye humare amaal hain aur tumhare liye tumhare amaal.. aur hum ussi (rab) k liye deen ko khaalis (pure) karte hain'."_

♦️☝🏼Yaha'n Yahud aur nasara se kaha Jaa raha hai k
   'Allah to sabka sanjha hai phir kyu jhagadte ho.'

*🔷Ae ehle kitaab ! Aao uss baat ki taraf jo hamare aur tumhare darmiyan yaksa hain (wo ye) k hum Allah k siwa kisi aur ki ibadat nahi karenge*
📗 *Surah Aal e Imran* 

   ☝🏼yaha par 3 terminologies aayi hain -  Allah Ta'ala ne ehl e imaan ki nishaniya batai hain 👇🏼
1️⃣ *وَّنَحۡنُ لَهٗ مُسۡلِمُوۡنَ*
Ae musalmanon ! tum ye kaho k hum Allah k samne muslim hote hai, sar e tasleem kham karte hain. 
*Surah Baqarah : 133*

2️⃣ *وَّنَحۡنُ لَهٗ عٰبِدُوۡنَ‏*
Hum ussi k ibadat guzaar hote hain. 
*Surah Baqarah:138*

3️⃣ *وَنَحۡنُ لَهٗ مُخۡلِصُوۡنَۙ*

arabic_text: اِذۡ  تَبَرَّاَ الَّذِیۡنَ اتُّبِعُوۡا مِنَ الَّذِیۡنَ اتَّبَعُوۡا  وَ رَاَوُا  الۡعَذَابَ وَ تَقَطَّعَتۡ بِہِمُ الۡاَسۡبَابُ ﴿۱۶۶﴾
translation: Jab bezaar (be-parwah) ho jayenge wo log jinki pairwi ki gayi, unse jo pairwi (obey) karte rahe; aur unke apas k saare talluqaat khatam ho jayenge.

*▪️وَ قَالَ الَّذِیۡنَ اتَّبَعُوۡا لَوۡ  اَنَّ لَنَا کَرَّۃً فَنَتَبَرَّاَ مِنۡہُمۡ کَمَا تَبَرَّءُوۡا مِنَّا  ؕ   کَذٰلِکَ یُرِیۡہِمُ اللّٰہُ  اَعۡمَالَہُمۡ حَسَرٰتٍ عَلَیۡہِمۡ  ؕ وَ مَا ہُمۡ  بِخٰرِجِیۡنَ مِنَ النَّارِ ﴿۱۶۷﴾*
_"Phir wo followers kehenge k kaash hum dunya me ek dafa  wapas chale jayein, to hum bhi tumse bezaari (la- talluqi) dunya me zaahir karenge jis tarah aaj tum humse bezaar ho rahe ho. arabic_text: وَ مَثَلُ الَّذِیۡنَ کَفَرُوۡا کَمَثَلِ الَّذِیۡ یَنۡعِقُ بِمَا لَا یَسۡمَعُ اِلَّا دُعَآءً  وَّ  نِدَآءً ؕ صُمٌّۢ  بُکۡمٌ عُمۡیٌ  فَہُمۡ  لَا  یَعۡقِلُوۡنَ ﴿۱۷۱﴾

arabic_text: لَیۡسَ الۡبِرَّ اَنۡ تُوَلُّوۡا وُجُوۡہَکُمۡ  قِبَلَ الۡمَشۡرِقِ وَ الۡمَغۡرِبِ وَ لٰکِنَّ الۡبِرَّ مَنۡ اٰمَنَ بِاللّٰہِ وَ الۡیَوۡمِ الۡاٰخِرِ وَ الۡمَلٰٓئِکَۃِ وَ الۡکِتٰبِ وَ النَّبِیّٖنَ ۚ وَ اٰتَی الۡمَالَ عَلٰی حُبِّہٖ ذَوِی الۡقُرۡبٰی وَ الۡیَتٰمٰی وَ الۡمَسٰکِیۡنَ  وَ ابۡنَ السَّبِیۡلِ  ۙ وَ السَّآئِلِیۡنَ وَ فِی الرِّقَابِ ۚ وَ اَقَامَ الصَّلٰوۃَ وَ اٰتَی الزَّکٰوۃَ ۚ وَ الۡمُوۡفُوۡنَ بِعَہۡدِہِمۡ  اِذَا عٰہَدُوۡا ۚ وَ الصّٰبِرِیۡنَ فِی الۡبَاۡسَآءِ وَ الضَّرَّآءِ  وَ حِیۡنَ الۡبَاۡسِ ؕ اُولٰٓئِکَ الَّذِیۡنَ صَدَقُوۡا ؕ وَ اُولٰٓئِکَ ہُمُ الۡمُتَّقُوۡنَ ﴿۱۷۷﴾
tafseer:

*▪️*
_"Neki sirf ye nahi hai k tum apna rukh mashriq ya magrib ki taraf kar lo. Balki neki ye hai 👉🏻jo koi imaan laye Allah par aur Qayamat k din ki jawab dehi par aur farishton par aur kitaabon par aur tamaam Ambiya par_

_Aur qayam karna namaz ko_
_(Namaz se badi kaunsi ibadat ho sakti hai lekin Issey rakha hai baad me) aur zakaat dena aur pura karna waadon ko jab kisi se kare aur sabar karne wale log musibat k halaat me, aur sakhti k haal me aur ladai k dauran (jihad me)_

_aise log hain jo apne dawa e Imaan me sachche hain aur yahi log hain jo haqiqi taur par parhezgar hain (Allah se dar kar kaam karne wale hain / jeene wale hain)_

🔅 *Description Part 1*

 🔺☝🏼 Yaha'n Basically yahudi ko taunt kiya jaa raha hai. Pichhli ayaato me hum tehweel e qibla ka topic padh chuke hain.  Yaha'n yahudiyon ki badmaashiyo ka zikr hai Qible k hawale se. 

     ♦️ Is aayat ko *Ayatul Birr* kaha jata hai jisme Allah Ta'ala ne neki ka phalsafa bayan kiya hai. 
     Usually humare yaha neki ka tasawwur chand rusumaat (rituals) par chalne ka naam hota hai isliye Qur'an e majeed ne is myth ko tod'te hue 👉🏻 jo cheezein log overlook karte hain, unhe buniyadi haisiyat di hai aur jin cheezo'n par logo'n ka zor hota hai, usko secondary haisiyat di hai. 

   ☝🏼 Neki ye nahi hai k sirf namaz, roza, hajj, zakat adaa kiye jayein. 👉🏻 ye sab ibadatein hain aur Huququl'lah (rights of God) hain. Ye to karne hain hi lekin huququl Ibaad (logon k haq) bahut hi critical issue hai. 

    🔺☝🏼 Iss aayat me Allah ne 3 cheezein highlight ki hain ~

1️⃣ *Imaniyaat*
      (Aqida e Tawheed isme farishton par imaan aata hai kyunki Allah ne hi unhe numainde muqarrar kiya hai.  *Risalat* 👉🏻 isme kitaabo'n par Imaan bhi fall karta hai kyunki kitaabein Ambiya par hi naazil hui hai aur  Akherat k din par imaan bhi shamil hota hai. )

2️⃣ *Huququl ibaad* (insaano par tamaam logo'n k rights)

3️⃣ Sabse last me *Huququllah*
(Allah k haq insaano par)

arabic_text: یٰۤاَیُّہَا الَّذِیۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡا کُتِبَ عَلَیۡکُمُ الۡقِصَاصُ فِی الۡقَتۡلٰی ؕ اَلۡحُرُّ بِالۡحُرِّ وَ الۡعَبۡدُ بِالۡعَبۡدِ وَ الۡاُنۡثٰی بِالۡاُنۡثٰی ؕ فَمَنۡ عُفِیَ لَہٗ مِنۡ اَخِیۡہِ شَیۡءٌ فَاتِّبَاعٌۢ بِالۡمَعۡرُوۡفِ وَ اَدَآءٌ اِلَیۡہِ بِاِحۡسَانٍ ؕ ذٰلِکَ تَخۡفِیۡفٌ مِّنۡ رَّبِّکُمۡ وَ رَحۡمَۃٌ  ؕ فَمَنِ اعۡتَدٰی بَعۡدَ ذٰلِکَ فَلَہٗ عَذَابٌ  اَلِیۡمٌ ﴿۱۷۸﴾
tafseer:
*

*▪️*
_"Ae Ahle Imaan ! Tum par Allah Ta'ala ne ye farz kar diya hai k qisaas lo qatal k mamle me, azaad k badle azaad qatal hoga aur gulam k badle gulam, aurat k badle aurat qatal hogi._
_Phir jis ko (qaatil)  maqtul (jisko qatal kiya gaya ho) ka waaris kuch maaf kar de to wo talab kar sakta hai diyat (blood money) , dastur k mutabik. Ye tumhare Rab ki taraf se riyayat hai aur Rehmat aur jo koi zyadti kare iss ke baad, to uske liye dardnaak azaab hai."_

    🔅☝🏼 Qatal ka badla lena Allah ne as an obligation shariyat ka hissa banaya hai.
      🔻Jo jaan bujh kar kisi ka qatal kare, usko badle me qatal kar diya jaye. Jaise 👉🏻 azaad k badle azaad 👉🏻 unch-nich Ameer Gareeb, sharif Badmash, mard aurat kisi ka bhi lihaaz nahi rakha jayega.

     ☝🏼 Ab Allah Ta'ala ek option de raha hai k agar maqtul k waaris qaatil ko maaf kar k  khumbaha (blood money) le le 
Aur blood money lene aur adaa krne me dono parties sharafat aur insaaf se kaam lein,.. to ye bhi kiya jaa sakta hai. 

 *🔷Aap alaihis Salam ne diyat (blood money) ki rakam 12 hazaar dir'ham muqarrar farmai* 
*📘Sunan ibne Majjah: 2629*

     ☝🏼Agar ab iske baad bhi koi Allah Ta'ala k kawanin (shariyat) ki khilaaf warzi karega, to yaqeenan dardnaak azaab ka haqdar hoga.

Sakht jurm ki saza bhi sakht honi chahiye, taaki jurm ki rok thaam ho sake warna mujrim to be khauf ghumenge.

arabic_text: اَلَمۡ تَرَ  اِلَی الۡمَلَاِ مِنۡۢ بَنِیۡۤ  اِسۡرَآءِیۡلَ مِنۡۢ بَعۡدِ مُوۡسٰی ۘ اِذۡ  قَالُوۡا لِنَبِیٍّ لَّہُمُ ابۡعَثۡ لَنَا مَلِکًا نُّقَاتِلۡ فِیۡ سَبِیۡلِ اللّٰہِ ؕ قَالَ ہَلۡ عَسَیۡتُمۡ  اِنۡ کُتِبَ عَلَیۡکُمُ الۡقِتَالُ اَلَّا تُقَاتِلُوۡا ؕ قَالُوۡا وَ مَا لَنَاۤ  اَلَّا نُقَاتِلَ فِیۡ سَبِیۡلِ اللّٰہِ وَ قَدۡ اُخۡرِجۡنَا مِنۡ دِیَارِنَا وَ اَبۡنَآئِنَا ؕ فَلَمَّا کُتِبَ عَلَیۡہِمُ الۡقِتَالُ تَوَلَّوۡا اِلَّا قَلِیۡلًا مِّنۡہُمۡ ؕ وَ اللّٰہُ عَلِیۡمٌۢ  بِالظّٰلِمِیۡنَ ﴿۲۴۶﴾

arabic_text: وَ اِذۡ قَالَ اِبۡرٰہٖمُ  رَبِّ اَرِنِیۡ  کَیۡفَ تُحۡیِ الۡمَوۡتٰی ؕ  قَالَ اَوَ لَمۡ تُؤۡمِنۡ ؕ قَالَ بَلٰی وَ لٰکِنۡ لِّیَطۡمَئِنَّ قَلۡبِیۡ ؕ قَالَ فَخُذۡ اَرۡبَعَۃً مِّنَ الطَّیۡرِ فَصُرۡہُنَّ اِلَیۡکَ ثُمَّ اجۡعَلۡ عَلٰی کُلِّ جَبَلٍ مِّنۡہُنَّ جُزۡءًا ثُمَّ ادۡعُہُنَّ یَاۡتِیۡنَکَ سَعۡیًا ؕ وَ اعۡلَمۡ اَنَّ اللّٰہَ عَزِیۡزٌ  حَکِیۡمٌ ﴿۲۶۰﴾
tafseer:
*

*▪️*
_"Aur yaad karo wo waqt jab Ibrahim ne apne Rab se arz kiya k- 'Ae mere Rab! mujhe dikha k tu murdon ko kaise Zinda karega?'_
_Allah ne kaha- 'kya tu yaqeen nahi rakhta, tera Imaan nahi hai ispar?'_
_Unhone kaha- 'kyu nahi! Lekin me apne dil k itminaan k liye chahta hun'._
_Allah ne farmaya k- '4 parindey paal aur unn parindon ko apne se maanus bhi kar (attach, familiar), phir unhe zibah karne k baad unke tukdon ko mix kar k pahado'n par rakh de, phir tu unhe bula, wo tere pass daud'te chale aenge aur khoob jaan lena k Allah Ta'ala gaalib hai Hikmat wala hai'."_

   ☝🏼 Ibrahim alaihis Salam ne Allah ki qudrat par aitraaz nahi kiya, balki wo uss activity ko dekhna chahte the k Allah murdon ko kaise Zinda karta hai. 

Allah Ta'ala ne Ambiya alaihim Salam ko logon ki hidayat ka zariya banana hota hai to unhe extra ordinary experiences se guzaara jaata hai taaki unka Imaan mohakam level ka ho jaye  (pakka, pukhta).

Kyunki Ambiya Allah k representative hote hain, unko Allah in saari stages se guzarta hai. 

💠 Iss waqiye se ye results nikalte hain 👇🏻👇🏻
➡️Iss waqiye ne qudrat ki ek nishani dikhai - Allah murdon ko kaise Zinda karega

➡️Dusra result ye nikla k koi paigamber bhi murdon ko khud se zinda nahi kar sakta. Ye protocol sirf Isa Ibn Mariyam ko Allah ne diya tha k wo murdon ko Zinda karte the lekin apne Rab k izan se.

➡️ Ibrahim alaihis Salam k paale hue parindey unke bulane par daude chale aaye to insaan ko apne haqiqi malik ki pukaar par nahi jana chahiye? Uski baat nahi maanni chahiye ? 

     Ye gaur karne layak baat hai.

arabic_text: یٰۤاَیُّہَا الَّذِیۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡا لَا تُبۡطِلُوۡا صَدَقٰتِکُمۡ بِالۡمَنِّ وَ الۡاَذٰی ۙ کَالَّذِیۡ یُنۡفِقُ مَالَہٗ رِئَآءَ النَّاسِ وَ لَا یُؤۡمِنُ بِاللّٰہِ وَ الۡیَوۡمِ الۡاٰخِرِؕ فَمَثَلُہٗ  کَمَثَلِ صَفۡوَانٍ عَلَیۡہِ تُرَابٌ فَاَصَابَہٗ وَابِلٌ فَتَرَکَہٗ صَلۡدًا ؕ لَا  یَقۡدِرُوۡنَ عَلٰی شَیۡءٍ مِّمَّا کَسَبُوۡا ؕ وَ اللّٰہُ  لَا یَہۡدِی الۡقَوۡمَ الۡکٰفِرِیۡنَ ﴿۲۶۴﴾
tafseer:
*

*
_"Ae Logon! Jo Imaan laye ho! Apne sadaqaat ko ehsaan jata kar aur dukh pahuncha kar baatil mat kar lo, uss aadmi ki tarha jo logon ko dikhane k liye kharch karta hai aur yaqeen nahi rakhta Allah par aur Akherat par._
_Uski misal aisi hai 👉🏻 jaise koi chikni chattan ho aur uss par matti jami ho, phir achanak uspar zor se baarish pade aur wo matti uss chikni chattan ko chhod kar alag ho jaye, phir se chikna paththar nazar aane lag jaye._
_Riyakaar (dikhawa karne wale) kuch bhi haasil nahi kar sakenge Qayamat wale din aur Allah Ta'ala hidayat nahi deta na-shukron ko."_

     ♦️ Iss aayat me riyakaar ki mazammat  bayan ki gayi hai. (condemn kiya hai)

    ☝🏼Aisa shakhs jo dikhane k liye kharch karta hai, uska maal kharch karna zero se multiply ho jata hai, bekar aur be-faida ho jata hai. 

   🔺 *Qayamat wale din jis shakhs ka sabse pehle faisla hoga wo aisa shakhs hoga jisey Allah ne maal diya hoga, wo Allah k pass laya jayega, phir Allah Ta'ala usey apni tamaam neamaten dikhayega, wo unn neamaton ko pehchan lega,*
 *phir Allah farmayega tune maal kaha'n kharch kiya? Wo kahega aisi koi madd jisme tujhe kharch karna pasand tha mene nahi chhodi,*
*Allah farmayega 👉🏻tu jhoot bolta hai, tune isliye kharch kiya taaki tujhe sakhi kaha jaye, phir hukum hoga aur ussey ondhe muh jahannum me daal diya jayega*
*📚Sahih Muslim:1905*

arabic_text: وَ مَثَلُ الَّذِیۡنَ یُنۡفِقُوۡنَ اَمۡوَالَہُمُ ابۡتِغَآءَ مَرۡضَاتِ اللّٰہِ وَ تَثۡبِیۡتًا مِّنۡ اَنۡفُسِہِمۡ کَمَثَلِ جَنَّۃٍ   ۢ بِرَبۡوَۃٍ اَصَابَہَا وَابِلٌ فَاٰتَتۡ اُکُلَہَا ضِعۡفَیۡنِ ۚ فَاِنۡ لَّمۡ یُصِبۡہَا وَابِلٌ فَطَلٌّ ؕ وَ اللّٰہُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُوۡنَ  بَصِیۡرٌ ﴿۲۶۵﴾
translation: Aur unn logon ki misal jo fakat Allah ki Raza k liye aur apne dilon ko saabit (firm) rakhte hue Allah ki raah me apna maal kharch karte hain, uss baag jaisi hai jo ek buland sar Zameen par ho, uss par zor ki baarish ho to wo baag dugna phal le kar aaye, aur agar uss par zor ki baarish na bhi ho to fohaar hi kaafi hai, aur jo kuch tum karte ho Allah usey khub jaanta hai

arabic_text: اَیَوَدُّ اَحَدُکُمۡ اَنۡ تَکُوۡنَ لَہٗ جَنَّۃٌ مِّنۡ نَّخِیۡلٍ وَّ اَعۡنَابٍ تَجۡرِیۡ مِنۡ تَحۡتِہَا الۡاَنۡہٰرُ ۙ لَہٗ فِیۡہَا مِنۡ کُلِّ الثَّمَرٰتِ ۙ وَ اَصَابَہُ الۡکِبَرُ وَ لَہٗ ذُرِّیَّۃٌ ضُعَفَآءُ ۪ۖ فَاَصَابَہَاۤ اِعۡصَارٌ فِیۡہِ نَارٌ فَاحۡتَرَقَتۡ ؕ  کَذٰلِکَ یُبَیِّنُ اللّٰہُ لَکُمُ الۡاٰیٰتِ لَعَلَّکُمۡ تَتَفَکَّرُوۡنَ ﴿۲۶۶﴾
tafseer:
*

*▪️*
_"Kya tum'me se koi ye chahega k uska ek baag ho, waha'n khajoor aur angur ho, uske niche nehare bhi behti ho aur waha'n har tarha ka phal bhi ugta ho aur wo budha (old) ho jaye aur uske bachche bhi ho chhote chhote,,,  k achanak ek aag ka bagol aaye (fire🔥 storm) aur wo saare baag ko jala kar raakh kar de._
_Bilkul isi tarha se Allah apni ayaat khol khol kar bayan krta hai taaki tum gaur aur fikar karo."_

      ☝🏼 Ek aur dil soz misal unke liye👉🏻 jo dikhawe k liye kharch karte hain👇🏻
      Kya koi shaksh ye pasand karega ki uski tamaam umr ki kamai uss waqt barbaad ho jaye jab k wo budha ho chuka ho  kamaane k kaabil na ho aur bachche bhi iss kaabil na ho k khaa-kama sake, maut saamne ho,,,.     To uss shakhs par kya guzregi k mere bachche ab kya khaae peeyenge. 

       To ye misal di Allah ne.  Usne badi mehnat se  Allah ki raah me kharch kiya lekin zero se multiply ho gaya.  Jis tarha wo budha shaksh zero par aa jata hai. 

      Maut k waqt iss tarha tumhara maal bhi zero par aa jayega, agar Allah ki raza k liye kharch na kiya hoga ya kisi par ehsaan jatane k liye kiya hoga.

arabic_text: یٰۤاَیُّہَا الَّذِیۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡۤا اَنۡفِقُوۡا مِنۡ طَیِّبٰتِ مَا کَسَبۡتُمۡ وَ مِمَّاۤ اَخۡرَجۡنَا لَکُمۡ مِّنَ الۡاَرۡضِ ۪ وَ لَا تَیَمَّمُوا الۡخَبِیۡثَ مِنۡہُ تُنۡفِقُوۡنَ وَ لَسۡتُمۡ بِاٰخِذِیۡہِ اِلَّاۤ اَنۡ تُغۡمِضُوۡا فِیۡہِ ؕ وَ اعۡلَمُوۡۤا  اَنَّ اللّٰہَ غَنِیٌّ حَمِیۡدٌ ﴿۲۶۷﴾
tafseer:
*

*▪️*
_"Ae Ehle Imaan ! Kharch karo unn paakizah cheezon me se jo tumne kamai hain aur uss me se bhi jo humne nikala hai tumhare liye zameen me se aur mat qasad karo raddi maal ka_
_(Allah ki raah me kharch krne k etbaar se) k wahi maal agar tumhe koi de to tum kabhi bhi usey qubul na karo magar ye k tum chasham poshi kar lo (avoid karna) aur khub jaan lo k Allah Ta'ala to be-parwah hai aur kaabil e taarif hai."_

*لَن تَنَالُوا۟ ٱلْبِرَّ حَتَّىٰ تُنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا تُحِبُّونَ*

*Surah Ale Imran:92*

   🔺 *Allah paak hai aur paakizah maal hi qubul karta hai*
📚 *Sahih Muslim:1015*

     💠 Sadqa ki qubuliyat k liye jis tarha zaruri hai k ehsaan na jataya jaye, takleef na di jaye aur Riyakaari (dikhawa) na ki jaye.

arabic_text: اِنۡ تُبۡدُوا الصَّدَقٰتِ فَنِعِمَّا ہِیَ ۚ وَ اِنۡ تُخۡفُوۡہَا وَ تُؤۡتُوۡہَا الۡفُقَرَآءَ فَہُوَ خَیۡرٌ لَّکُمۡ ؕ وَ یُکَفِّرُ عَنۡکُمۡ مِّنۡ سَیِّاٰتِکُمۡ ؕ وَ اللّٰہُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُوۡنَ خَبِیۡرٌ ﴿۲۷۱﴾
translation: Agar tum apne sadaqaat ko zaahir karte ho to ye achchi baat hai aur agar tum poshida rakh kar fakeeron ko do to ye tumhare liye ussey bhi achchi baat hai, (in sadqaat ki barkat se) Allah mita dega tumhare gunah aur Allah Ta'ala khabardar hai unn Aamaal se jo tum kar rahe ho

arabic_text: لَیۡسَ عَلَیۡکَ ہُدٰىہُمۡ وَ لٰکِنَّ اللّٰہَ یَہۡدِیۡ مَنۡ یَّشَآءُ ؕ وَ مَا تُنۡفِقُوۡا مِنۡ خَیۡرٍ فَلِاَنۡفُسِکُمۡ ؕ وَ مَا تُنۡفِقُوۡنَ اِلَّا ابۡتِغَآءَ وَجۡہِ اللّٰہِ ؕ وَ مَا تُنۡفِقُوۡا مِنۡ خَیۡرٍ یُّوَفَّ اِلَیۡکُمۡ وَ اَنۡتُمۡ لَا تُظۡلَمُوۡنَ ﴿۲۷۲﴾
translation: Ae Nabi ! Aap ki zimmedari nahi hai kisi ko sidhe raaste par chalana, balki Allah jisey chahta hai seedhi raah par chala deta hai, jo kuch bhi tum kharch karte ho, usme tumhara apna hi faida hai aur jo kuch tum kharch karte ho iske liye ek hi reason hona chahiye 👉🏻Allah ki Raza, aur jo koi apne maal me se kharch karta hai, Allah k huzur to Allah tumhe wo maal lauta dega Akherat me aur tum par koi zulm nahi hoga
tafseer:
*

*▪️*
__

   🔺 *Sahaba is baat ko na -pasand karte the k wo apne mushrik rishtedaron ko thoda sa bhi present de, jab unhone Rasoolallah (s.w.a) se dariyaft kiya to aapne thoda sa kharch karne ki ijazat de di to Allah ne ye aayat nazil farmai 👉🏻Ae Nabi hidayat dena Aap ki zimmedari nahi....... To Allah Ta'ala ne mushrikon par maal kharch karne ki ijazat de di*
📚 *Sunan Al Kubra Lil Nisai : 11052*

arabic_text: لِلۡفُقَرَآءِ الَّذِیۡنَ اُحۡصِرُوۡا فِیۡ سَبِیۡلِ اللّٰہِ لَا یَسۡتَطِیۡعُوۡنَ ضَرۡبًا فِی الۡاَرۡضِ ۫ یَحۡسَبُہُمُ الۡجَاہِلُ اَغۡنِیَآءَ مِنَ التَّعَفُّفِ ۚ تَعۡرِفُہُمۡ بِسِیۡمٰہُمۡ ۚ لَا یَسۡئَلُوۡنَ النَّاسَ اِلۡحَافًا ؕ وَ مَا تُنۡفِقُوۡا مِنۡ خَیۡرٍ فَاِنَّ اللّٰہَ بِہٖ عَلِیۡمٌ ﴿۲۷۳﴾
translation: Sadqa aur khairaat k sabse zyada haqdaar wo log hain jo Allah ki raah me rok liye gaye hain, unhe itni fursat hi nahi k zameen me chal phir kar apni rozi kama sakein, unki haalat ye hai k jo na waqif shakhs unko dekhta hai to unke sawal na karne k sabab unko gani (rich) samjh leta hai, tum unko unke cheharon se pehchan loge, ye wo log hain jo logon se lipat ke nahi maangte, aur jo kuch bhi tum kharch karte ho pas Allah Ta'ala usey khub jaanta hai
tafseer:
*

*▪️*
__

   ☝🏼Issey murad As-habe Suffa hai jo pura din Nabi alaihis Salam se ilm haasil karte the. Ab wo ma'ash (rozi) ki jiddo jahad karte to ilm haasil kab aur kaise karte ?

   ☝🏼 Sabse zyada tumhare sadaqaat k haqdaar wo log hain jinhone apni zindagi deen k liye waqf kar di. 
   ☝🏼 Aise log sawal to nahi karte lekin faaqo ki wajah se hum unko pehchan sakte hain. 

   🔺 Abu Hurairah farmate hain k kai dafa faaqon ki wajah se main behosh ho jata tha. Log samjhte the isey mirgi ka daura pad gaya hai.
Lekin me maangta kisi se nahi tha 
📚 *Sahih Bukhari Sahih Muslim*

arabic_text: اَلَّذِیۡنَ یُنۡفِقُوۡنَ اَمۡوَالَہُمۡ بِالَّیۡلِ وَ النَّہَارِ سِرًّا وَّ عَلَانِیَۃً فَلَہُمۡ اَجۡرُہُمۡ عِنۡدَ رَبِّہِمۡ ۚ وَ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَیۡہِمۡ وَ لَا ہُمۡ یَحۡزَنُوۡنَ ﴿۲۷۴﴾ؔ

arabic_text: اَلَّذِیۡنَ یَاۡکُلُوۡنَ الرِّبٰوا لَا یَقُوۡمُوۡنَ اِلَّا کَمَا یَقُوۡمُ الَّذِیۡ یَتَخَبَّطُہُ الشَّیۡطٰنُ مِنَ الۡمَسِّ ؕ ذٰلِکَ بِاَنَّہُمۡ قَالُوۡۤا اِنَّمَا الۡبَیۡعُ مِثۡلُ الرِّبٰوا ۘ وَ اَحَلَّ اللّٰہُ الۡبَیۡعَ وَ حَرَّمَ الرِّبٰوا ؕ فَمَنۡ جَآءَہٗ مَوۡعِظَۃٌ مِّنۡ رَّبِّہٖ فَانۡتَہٰی فَلَہٗ مَا سَلَفَ ؕ وَ اَمۡرُہٗۤ اِلَی اللّٰہِ ؕ وَ مَنۡ عَادَ فَاُولٰٓئِکَ اَصۡحٰبُ النَّارِ ۚ ہُمۡ فِیۡہَا خٰلِدُوۡنَ ﴿۲۷۵﴾

arabic_text: اِنَّ الَّذِیۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡا وَ عَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ وَ اَقَامُوا الصَّلٰوۃَ وَ اٰتَوُا الزَّکٰوۃَ لَہُمۡ اَجۡرُہُمۡ عِنۡدَ رَبِّہِمۡ ۚ وَ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَیۡہِمۡ وَ لَا ہُمۡ  یَحۡزَنُوۡنَ ﴿۲۷۷﴾

arabic_text: فَاِنۡ لَّمۡ تَفۡعَلُوۡا فَاۡذَنُوۡا بِحَرۡبٍ مِّنَ اللّٰہِ وَ رَسُوۡلِہٖ ۚ وَ  اِنۡ تُبۡتُمۡ  فَلَکُمۡ رُءُوۡسُ اَمۡوَالِکُمۡ ۚ لَا تَظۡلِمُوۡنَ وَ لَا تُظۡلَمُوۡنَ ﴿۲۷۹﴾

arabic_text: وَ اِنۡ کَانَ ذُوۡ عُسۡرَۃٍ فَنَظِرَۃٌ اِلٰی مَیۡسَرَۃٍ ؕ وَ اَنۡ تَصَدَّقُوۡا خَیۡرٌ لَّکُمۡ اِنۡ  کُنۡتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُوۡنَ ﴿۲۸۰﴾

*ahkamaat k aitbar se* wahi ki gayi aakhri aayat hai. Aur ye ek aayat nahi hai, ye pichhe se start hui hai aur end iska 281 par ho raha hai. (Matlab iske sath aur bhi aayatein nazil hui par surah baqarah me ye wali aayat last me nazil hui)

⭕ Sahih Bukhari me Ibne Abbas ka qaul hai k quran e Hakeem ki ye sabse aakhri aayat hai, aur imaam Bukhari ne baab bhi bandha hai k ye sabse aakhir me nazil hone wali ayat e mubaraka hai, aur Tafseer ibne Jarih ne bhi yahi likha hai. 

     Yani ye Allah ka uske bando ki taraf aakhri ahkaam (commands) me se hai jo insaaniyat ki taraf diya gaya hai.

     ♦️ Ab Qayamat tak koi paigamber nahi aayega. Insaan aur Allah ka rishta iss Quran k zariye qayam hai aur usme aakhri baat ye hai k jab bhi koi khat likhta hai ✍ to Aakhir me nasihat likhi jaati hai. 

    Ye hum insaano k liye Allah ki aakhri nasihato'n me se hai. 💔💔💔

arabic_text: یٰۤاَیُّہَا الَّذِیۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡۤا اِذَا تَدَایَنۡتُمۡ بِدَیۡنٍ اِلٰۤی اَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّی فَاکۡتُبُوۡہُ ؕ وَ لۡیَکۡتُبۡ بَّیۡنَکُمۡ کَاتِبٌۢ بِالۡعَدۡلِ ۪ وَ لَا یَاۡبَ کَاتِبٌ اَنۡ یَّکۡتُبَ کَمَا عَلَّمَہُ اللّٰہُ فَلۡیَکۡتُبۡ ۚ
tafseer:
*

*▪️*

*وَ لۡیُمۡلِلِ الَّذِیۡ عَلَیۡہِ الۡحَقُّ وَ لۡیَتَّقِ اللّٰہَ رَبَّہٗ وَ لَا یَبۡخَسۡ مِنۡہُ شَیۡئًا ؕ فَاِنۡ کَانَ الَّذِیۡ عَلَیۡہِ الۡحَقُّ سَفِیۡہًا اَوۡ ضَعِیۡفًا اَوۡ لَا یَسۡتَطِیۡعُ اَنۡ یُّمِلَّ ہُوَ  فَلۡیُمۡلِلۡ وَلِیُّہٗ بِالۡعَدۡلِ ؕ وَ اسۡتَشۡہِدُوۡا شَہِیۡدَیۡنِ مِنۡ رِّجَالِکُمۡ ۚ*

*فَاِنۡ لَّمۡ یَکُوۡنَا رَجُلَیۡنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَّ امۡرَاَتٰنِ مِمَّنۡ تَرۡضَوۡنَ مِنَ الشُّہَدَآءِ اَنۡ تَضِلَّ اِحۡدٰىہُمَا فَتُذَکِّرَ اِحۡدٰىہُمَا الۡاُخۡرٰی ؕ وَ لَا یَاۡبَ الشُّہَدَآءُ اِذَا مَا دُعُوۡا ؕ وَ لَا تَسۡئَمُوۡۤا اَنۡ تَکۡتُبُوۡہُ صَغِیۡرًا اَوۡ کَبِیۡرًا اِلٰۤی اَجَلِہٖ ؕ*

*ذٰلِکُمۡ اَقۡسَطُ عِنۡدَ اللّٰہِ وَ اَقۡوَمُ لِلشَّہَادَۃِ وَ اَدۡنٰۤی اَلَّا تَرۡتَابُوۡۤا اِلَّاۤ اَنۡ تَکُوۡنَ تِجَارَۃً حَاضِرَۃً  تُدِیۡرُوۡنَہَا بَیۡنَکُمۡ فَلَیۡسَ عَلَیۡکُمۡ جُنَاحٌ اَلَّا تَکۡتُبُوۡہَا ؕ وَ اَشۡہِدُوۡۤا اِذَا تَبَایَعۡتُمۡ ۪ وَ لَا یُضَآرَّ کَاتِبٌ وَّ لَا شَہِیۡدٌ  ۬ ؕ وَ  اِنۡ تَفۡعَلُوۡا فَاِنَّہٗ فُسُوۡقٌۢ بِکُمۡ ؕ*

 *وَ اتَّقُوا اللّٰہَ ؕ وَ یُعَلِّمُکُمُ اللّٰہُ ؕ وَ اللّٰہُ بِکُلِّ شَیۡءٍ  عَلِیۡمٌ ﴿۲۸۲﴾*

_"Ae Ehle Imaan! Jab tum ek dusre ko karz do, kuch muqarra muddat k liye, to usey likh liya karo aur tumhare darmiyan jo likhne wala hai wo Insaaf k saath likhe aur likhne wala likhne se inkaar naa kare jaise k Allah ne usey sikhaya hai,_

_"aur wo shakhs likhwaye jiske zimme karz ho (makruz) aur dare Allah se jo uska parwardigar hai, aur na kami kare usme zarre k barabar bhi, phir wo shakhs  jisne qarza liya hai, itna nadaan hai ya kamzor hai aur usme itna confidence bhi nahi hai k wo likhwa sake to phir uska wali/qareebi rishtedaar imla karwa de (likhwa de)_

_aur iss pure mamle ki 2 mard gawahi denge aur agar 2 mard na mil sake to ek mard aur 2 aurten jinhen tum gawah k taur par pasand karo 👉🏻(iski wajah ye hai) agar ek aurat bhul jaye, to dusri usey yaad karwa de,_

_aur na inkaar kare gawah jab wo bulaye jaye gawahi k liye, aur mat uktaya karo iss baat se khuwa thoda qarza ho ya zyada k tum likhne padhne se bhaago, jab kisi muqarrar muddat tak k liye qarza do kisi ko,,,    👈🏼 ye Allah k nazdeek bahut Insaaf k layak hai, ye cheez aur Mahfuz (safe) rakhne wali hai gawahi ko, aur asaan tarika hai k tumhe shaq se bacha legi (ye likhat padhat wali cheez)_

_haan isme ek exception hai agar tum aapas me nagad len den kar rahe ho to phir usme likhat padhat ki zarurat nahi hai. Aur gawah zarur bana liya karo jab khareed o farokht karo, aur na takleef di jaye likhne wale kaatib ko aur na gawahi dene wale ko, aur agar tum aisa karoge to ye Allah k huzur na-farmani shumar hogi_

_aur Allah se dar jao aur Allah tumhe sikhata hai [dunya me rehne k adaab e mu'asherat (society)] aur  Allah ta'ala har cheez ko apne Ilm se ghere hue hai"_ 

(🔅 ye puri ek hi aayat hai  jo k Qur'an majeed ki sabse lambi aayat hai. 
     Iska description in sha Allah agli post me hoga)

arabic_text: وَ اِنۡ کُنۡتُمۡ عَلٰی سَفَرٍ وَّ لَمۡ تَجِدُوۡا کَاتِبًا فَرِہٰنٌ مَّقۡبُوۡضَۃٌ ؕ فَاِنۡ اَمِنَ بَعۡضُکُمۡ بَعۡضًا فَلۡیُؤَدِّ الَّذِی اؤۡتُمِنَ اَمَانَتَہٗ وَ لۡیَتَّقِ اللّٰہَ رَبَّہٗ ؕ وَ لَا تَکۡتُمُوا الشَّہَادَۃَ ؕ وَ مَنۡ یَّکۡتُمۡہَا فَاِنَّہٗۤ اٰثِمٌ قَلۡبُہٗ ؕ وَ اللّٰہُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُوۡنَ عَلِیۡمٌ ﴿۲۸۳﴾

arabic_text: لِلّٰہِ مَا فِی السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ مَا فِی الۡاَرۡضِ ؕ وَ اِنۡ تُبۡدُوۡا مَا فِیۡۤ  اَنۡفُسِکُمۡ اَوۡ تُخۡفُوۡہُ یُحَاسِبۡکُمۡ بِہِ  اللّٰہُ ؕ فَیَغۡفِرُ   لِمَنۡ یَّشَآءُ  وَ یُعَذِّبُ مَنۡ یَّشَآءُ ؕ وَ اللّٰہُ عَلٰی کُلِّ شَیۡءٍ  قَدِیۡرٌ ﴿۲۸۴﴾

arabic_text: اٰمَنَ الرَّسُوۡلُ بِمَاۤ  اُنۡزِلَ اِلَیۡہِ مِنۡ رَّبِّہٖ وَ الۡمُؤۡمِنُوۡنَ ؕ کُلٌّ اٰمَنَ بِاللّٰہِ وَ مَلٰٓئِکَتِہٖ وَ کُتُبِہٖ وَ رُسُلِہٖ ۟ لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَیۡنَ  اَحَدٍ مِّنۡ رُّسُلِہٖ ۟ وَ قَالُوۡا سَمِعۡنَا وَ اَطَعۡنَا ٭۫ غُفۡرَانَکَ رَبَّنَا وَ اِلَیۡکَ الۡمَصِیۡرُ ﴿۲۸۵﴾

arabic_text: لَا یُکَلِّفُ اللّٰہُ نَفۡسًا اِلَّا وُسۡعَہَا ؕ لَہَا مَا کَسَبَتۡ وَ عَلَیۡہَا مَا اکۡتَسَبَتۡ ؕ رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذۡنَاۤ  اِنۡ نَّسِیۡنَاۤ  اَوۡ اَخۡطَاۡنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَ لَا  تَحۡمِلۡ عَلَیۡنَاۤ  اِصۡرًا کَمَا حَمَلۡتَہٗ عَلَی الَّذِیۡنَ مِنۡ قَبۡلِنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَ لَا  تُحَمِّلۡنَا مَا لَا طَاقَۃَ لَنَا بِہٖ ۚ وَ اعۡفُ عَنَّا ٝ وَ اغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ٝ وَ ارۡحَمۡنَا ٝ اَنۡتَ مَوۡلٰىنَا فَانۡصُرۡنَا عَلَی الۡقَوۡمِ الۡکٰفِرِیۡنَ ﴿۲۸۶﴾
translation: Allah Ta'ala kisi jaan par uski bardaasht se zyada bojh nahi daal'ta , usey ajr milega uske nek amaal ka bhi aur wabaal bhi hoga bure aamaal jo kamaye hain.  Ae humare Rab!
